[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, 'pathway,', requiring, much, lower, cAMP, concentration, to, that, required, for, 'CREB/ATF-1', 'hyper-phosphorylation,', is, responsible, for, histone, 'H3', dephosphorylation, and, may, be, linked, to, mTOR, down, regulation])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'adrenal,', the, type, 'I', 3, &, 'beta;-hydroxysteroid', dehydrogenase, '(', 'HSD3B1)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([exclusively, in, the, zona, glomerulosa, '(', 'ZG),', where, aldosterone, is, produced])].
[sujeto(['We', previously, showed, that, 'AngII', can]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([expression, of, 'HSD3B1'])].
[sujeto(['But,', 'K(+)', responsiveness, of, this, gene]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, unexplored])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'K(+)', stimulation, lacks, the, ability, to, induce, 'HSD3B1', expression, in, human, adrenocortical, 'H295R', cells])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'AngII', and, 'K(+)', were, able, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([transcription, of, the, aldosterone, synthase, gene, '(', 'CYP11B2)'])].
[sujeto(['Promoter', analysis, revealed, that, although, both, 'AngII', and, 'K(+)']), verbo([activate]), complemento([transcription, from, the, 'Ca(2+)/cAMP-responsive', element, '(', 'CRE)', located, in, the, 'CYP11B2', 'promoter,', the, orphan, nuclear, receptor, 'NGFIB-responsive', element, '(', 'NBRE)', located, in, the, 'HSD3B1', promoter, fails, to, respond, to, 'K(+),', being, only, able, to, enhance, transcription, after, 'AngII', treatment])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, induction, of, de, novo, protein, synthesis, of, 'NGFIB', occurs, only, after, 'AngII', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, assay, confirmed, that, the, 'NGFIB', protein, occupies, the, 'HSD3B1', promoter, only, after, 'AngII,', while, 'ATF2']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'CYP11B2', promoter, in, response, to, both, 'AngII', and, 'K(+)'])].

[sujeto(['Viral', engagement, with, macrophages]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Toll-Like-Receptors', '(', 'TLRs)', and, viruses, must, contend, with, the, ensuing, inflammatory, responses, to, successfully, complete, their, replication, cycle])].
[sujeto(['To', 'date,', known, 'counter-strategies']), verbo([involve]), complemento([the, use, of, 'viral-encoded', proteins, that, often, employ, mimicry, mechanisms, to, block, or, redirect, the, host, response, to, benefit, the, virus])].
[sujeto(['Whether', viral, regulatory, 'DNA', sequences]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, opportunistic, strategy, by, which, viral, enhancer, elements, functionally, mimic, innate, immune, enhancers, is, unknown])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', taken, with, our, previously, published, 'results,', the, kidney]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([all, five, somatostatin, receptors])].
[sujeto(['Systemic', infusion, of, somatostatin, '(', 'SRIF)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([many, physiological, changes, in, human, and, rodent, 'kidneys,', including, alterations, in, glomerular, 'filtration,', solute, 'transport,', and, water, clearance])].
[sujeto(['Although', somatostatin, can]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, five, different, 'G-protein', coupled, receptors, '(', 'SSTRs),', only, 'SSTR1', and, 'SSTR2A', proteins, have, been, described, convincingly, in, rat, 'and/or', human, kidneys])].
[sujeto(['Both', are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([primarily, in, collecting, 'ducts,', despite, clear, evidence, that, somatostatin, also, can, bind, to, proximal, tubules])].
[sujeto(['SSTR3', was, present, in, intracellular, 'granules,', while, 'SSTR4', and, 'SSTR5', were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, the, lumenal, membranes, of, the, tubules])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, kidney, is, one, of, few, organs]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([all, five, somatostatin, receptors, outside, of, the, nervous, system, and, pancreas])].
[sujeto(['In', experiment, 2, ',', the, suppression, of, emptying, during, fill]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'Oct', '(', 1.4, 'nmol/kg)', was, reversed, by, 10, or, 40, 'microgram/kg', of, the, somatostatin, antagonist, 'cyclo(7-aminoheptanoyl-Phe-D-Trp-Lys-Thr[Bzl])'])].
[sujeto(['The', point, of, transition, between]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([and, increased, emptying, did, not, depend, on, time, from, injection, or, from, infusion, onset, but, was, linked, to, the, offset, of, the, intragastric, infusion, regardless, of, its, duration])].
[sujeto(['Corticotropin-releasing', factor, '(', 'CRF)']), verbo([acts]), complemento([centrally, to, suppress, gastric, emptying, and, increase, plasma, levels, of, somatostatin, in, rats])].
[sujeto(['The', experiments, were, conducted, to, examine, whether, 'cyclo(7-aminoheptanoyl-phe-D-TRP-LYS-THR[BZL]),', which]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, somatostatin, antagonist, in, 'vivo,', blocks, the, effect, of, 'CRF', on, gastric, emptying, of, glucose])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, endogenously, released, somatostatin, participates, in, 'CRF-induced', suppression, of, gastric, emptying, during, gastric, fill])].
[sujeto(['Cholangiocytes']), verbo([express]), complemento([receptors, for, secretin, and, 'somatostatin,', hormones, that, alter, intracellular, levels, of, cAMP, in, opposite, 'directions;', these, alterations, very, likely, alter, the, activation, '(', i])].
[sujeto(['Although', our, understanding, of, these, mechanisms, is, sill, 'embryonic,', it, is, anticipated, that, accelerated, research, efforts, by, laboratories, utilizing, recently, available, experimental, models, will]), verbo([provide]), complemento([important, advances, in, the, knowledge, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, involved, in, the, transport, of, water, and, solutes, by, cholangiocytes])].
[sujeto(['Experiments', in, vivo, and, in, vitro, were, performed, in, the, rat, to, define, the, role, of, somatostatin, in]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, 'hydro-osmotic', action, of, arginine, vasopressin])].
[sujeto(['Somatostatin', had, a, biphasic, effect, on, basal, collecting, duct, diffusional, water, permeability, with, 10, '(', -, 9, ')', 'mol/l', somatostatin, producing, a, 14, '%', reduction, in, 'permeability,', whereas, concentrations, of, 10, '(', -, 6, ')', and, 10, '(', -, 5, ')', 'mol/l', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([basal, water, permeability, by, 13, '%', and, 22, '%', ',', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Somatostatin', '(', 10, '(', -, 9, ')', 'mol/l)', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, increase, in, water, permeability, produced, by, arginine, 'vasopressin,', although, this, inhibitory, effect, was, reduced, by, a, 10, -, fold, increase, in, arginine, vasopressin, concentration, '(', 5, 'ng/ml)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, anaesthetized, 'water-diuretic', 'rat,', low, dose, somatostatin, '(', 60, 'micrograms/h)']), verbo([increased]), complemento([free, water, clearance, by, 23, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', whereas, increasing, the, somatostatin, concentration, '(', 600, 'micrograms/h)', produced, a, transitory, 40, '%', fall, in, free, water, clearance, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')'])].

[sujeto(['Somatostatin', is, known, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([hepatic, bile, secretion, and, gallbladder, emptying])].

[sujeto(['The', 'HIV', accessory, protein, 'Nef', is, a, major, determinant, of, viral, pathogenesis, that, facilitates, viral, particle, 'release,']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([viral, antigen, presentation, and, increases, infectivity, of, new, virus, particles])].

[sujeto(['Nef']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, adaptor, protein, 2, '(', 'AP-2)', and, 'CD4', in, 'clathrin-coated', 'pits,', forcing, 'CD4', internalization, and, its, subsequent, targeting, to, lysosomes])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, this, lysosomal, targeting, requires, a, variant, of, 'AP-1', containing, isoform, 2, of, 'γ-adaptin', '(', 'AP1G2,', hereafter, 'γ2)'])].
[sujeto(['Depletion', of, γ2, also, hinders, 'EGFR-EGF-complex']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([to, 'lysosomes,', an, effect, that, is, not, observed, upon, γ1, depletion])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, the, presence, of, γ1, or, γ2, subunits, delineates, two, distinct, variants, of, 'AP-1', 'complexes,', with, different, functions, in, protein, sorting])].
[sujeto(['Tumor', necrosis, 'factor-α-inducible', protein, 8, '(', 'TNFAIP8)', is, the, first, discovered, oncogenic, and, an, 'anti-apoptotic', member, of, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['TNFAIP8', or, 'TIPE', family, of, proteins])].
[sujeto(['TNFAIP8', mRNA, is]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'NF-kB,', and, overexpression, of, 'TNFAIP8', has, been, correlated, with, poor, prognosis, in, many, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Downregulation', of, 'TNFAIP8', expression]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, decreased, pulmonary, colonization, of, human, tumor, 'cells,', and, enhanced, sensitivities, of, tumor, xenografts, to, radiation, and, docetaxel])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, effects, of, depletion, of, 'TNFAIP8', on, the, 'mRNA,', microRNA, and, protein, expression, profiles, in, prostate, and, breast, cancers, and, melanoma])].
[sujeto(['Depending', on, the, tumor, cell, 'type,', knockdown, of, 'TNFAIP8', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, associated, with, increased, mRNA, expression, of, several, antiproliferative, and, apoptotic, genes, '(', e])].

[sujeto(['TNFAIP8-centric', molecules, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, predominately, implicated, in, the, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-1α', '(', 'HIF-1α)', signaling, 'pathway,', and, cancer, and, development, signaling, networks])].

[sujeto(['EGFR', is, a, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([in, 'NSCLC', for, 'EGFR-mutant', patients])].

[sujeto(['Receptor', tyrosine, 'kinases,', such, as, the, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)', receptor, '(', 'EGFR)', and, 'Met']), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, activation, of, intracellular, signals, including, 'Akt,', a, critical, regulator, of, cell, 'survival,', metabolism, and, proliferation])].

[sujeto(['We', describe, a, technique, for, the, specific, isolation, and, downstream, proteomic, characterization, of, any, two]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['proteins,', to, the, exclusion, of, their, individual, moieties, and, competing, binding, partners])].

[sujeto(['Two', important, strategies, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([attenuated, lung, cancers, were, through, treatments, with, 'EGFR-tyrosine', 'kinase-inhibitors,', erlotinib, and, 'gefitinib,', or, 'EGFR-neutralizing', 'antibodies,', cetuximab, and, bevacizumab])].

[sujeto(['Cellular', transformation, occurs, only, in, cells, that]), verbo([express]), complemento([both, 'ErbB1', and, 'ErbB4', 'receptors,', but, not, in, cells, expressing, only, one, or, the, other, of, these, receptors])].

[sujeto(['To']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, underlying, regulatory, mechanism, of, the, 'kinase/phosphatase', network, in, 'ErbB', 'homo-', and, heterodimer, receptor, 'signaling,', extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', and, 'Akt', activities, were, evaluated, in, the, presence, of, several, enzyme, inhibitors, in, 'ligand-induced', cells, expressing, 'ErbB1', '(', 'E1),', 'ErbB4', '(', 'E4),', and, 'ErbB1/ErbB4', '(', 'E1/4)', receptor])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'B-Raf', isolated, only, from, 'E1/4', cells, could]), verbo([induce]), complemento([in, vitro, phosphorylation, for, 'MEK;', this, 'B-Raf', kinase, activity, was, abolished, by, pretreatment, of, the, cells, with, okadaic, acid])].

[sujeto(['Due', to, heterodimerization, and, a, variety, of]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento(['ligands,', the, 'ErbB', receptor, system, is, both, diverse, and, 'flexible,', which, proves, particularly, advantageous, to, the, aberrant, signaling, of, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', specific, mechanisms, of, how, a, particular, receptor, contributes, to, generating, the, flexibility, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, aberrant, growth, regulation, have, not, been, well, described])].
[sujeto([2, 'C4', blocked, 'EGF-mediated', phosphorylation, of, 'ErbB2', and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['PI3K/Akt', and, 'anchorage-independent', growth, but, did, not, affect, 'ErbB1', or, 'MAPK'])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'HER2', expression, is, elevated, in, bone, metastases, of, prostate, cancer, independently, of, gene, amplification])].

[sujeto(['However,', plants]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, plasticity, in, their, defense, mechanisms, enabling, them, to, tolerate, 'and,', 'sometimes,', even, survive, adverse, environmental, conditions])].

[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, 'SOS1', gene]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'HGF1', is, not, significantly, 'up-regulated', in, 'HHG'])].
[sujeto(['At', 'HGF2', we, identify, 'RASA1', '(', rat, sarcoma, viral, p21, protein, activator, 1, ')', as, a, candidate, gene, for, 'HHG,', as, it, is, 'up-regulated', in, affected, foxes, and, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'MAPK', signalling])].
[sujeto(['From', comparison, to, the, genes, within, the, 'HGF3', 'locus,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([evidence, for, a, role, of, androgens, in, 'HHG', phenotype, severity, by, differential, 'up-regulation', of, 'SRD5A2', in, 'HHG-affected', foxes])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, compare, sequences, for, the, 'SOS1', 'gene,', and, two, adjacent, genes, in, the, 'Ras', 'pathway,', growth, receptor]), verbo([bound]), complemento([protein, 2, '(', 'GRB2)', and, epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, '(', 'EGFR),', between, 'HHG-affected', and, unaffected, foxes])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, known, 'HGF', causative, mutation, does, not]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['HHG', in, 'foxes,', nor, do, the, coding, regions, or, 'intron-exon', boundaries, of, these, three, genes, contain, any, candidate, mutations, for, fox, gum, disease])].
[sujeto(['Patterns', of, molecular, evolution, among, foxes, and, other, mammals, reflect, high, conservation, and, strong, functional, constraints, for, 'SOS1', and, 'GRB2', but]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, 'lineage-specific', pattern, of, variability, in, 'EGFR', consistent, with, mutational, rate, 'differences,', relaxed, functional, 'constraints,', and, possibly, positive, selection])].
[sujeto([126, ',', 142, -, 126, ',', 143, 'insC)', in, 'son-of-sevenless-1', '(', 'SOS1)', gene]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, 'non-syndromic', 'HGF', in, a, 'Brazilian', family])].

[sujeto(['The', action, of, 'HGF/SF', on, cells, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, autophosphorylation, of, 'Met', on, two, carboxyterminal, tyrosine, 'residues,', 'Y1349VHVNATVY1356VNV'])].
[sujeto(['The', two, tyrosine, residues]), verbo([provide]), complemento([docking, sites, for, various, effector, 'molecules,', suggesting, that, multiple, signaling, pathways, are, activated, to, exert, biological, effects, of, 'HGF/SF', '[', 'Ponzetto', et, al])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Tpr-Met', efficiently, activates, the, uPA, gene, via, a, 'SOS/Ras/extracellular', signal, regulated, kinase, '(', 'ERK)-dependent', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'Y1356,', which, abrogates, 'GRB2', 'binding,', reduced, the, induction, to, half, of, the, control, 'level,', while, mutation, of, 'Y1349', showed, little, effect, on, uPA, 'induction,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, important, but, partly, replaceable, role, for, 'GRB2', in, 'Met-dependent', uPA, gene, induction])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, both, 'Y1349VHV', and, 'Y1356VNV', into, optimal, 'PI', 3, -, kinase, sites, resulted, in, a, residual, induction, of, about, one, quarter, of, the, control, 'level,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, potential, role, for, 'PI', 3, -, kinase])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, interplay, among, different, signaling, molecules, on, the, receptor, is, important, for, full, induction, of, the, pathway, leading, to, the, activation, of, the, uPA, gene])].
[sujeto(['Phosphotyrosine', peptide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'Grb2', induces, tryptophan, fluorescence, changes, in, the, 'Src', homology, 2, '(', 'SH2)', domain])].
[sujeto(['Affinities', are, in, the, nanomolar, 'range,', the, 'Shc', peptide, having, the, highest, 'affinity,', followed, by, peptides, mimicking, 'Grb2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, on, 'EGF', and, 'HGF', 'receptors,', the, putative, sites, on, insulin, and, 'IGF-1', receptors, having, much, lower, affinities])].
[sujeto(['Proline-rich', peptide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'SH3', domains, induces, fluorescence, changes, mainly, in, the, 'C-terminal', 'SH3'])].
[sujeto(['Additional', residues, before, this, 'PVPPPVPP', motif]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, minor, contribution, to, the, 'binding,', but, the, two, residues, after, this, motif, are, important, and, may, contribute, to, specificity])].
[sujeto(['The', affinity, of, each, 'SH3', for, each, 'proline-rich', motif, is, too, low, to, account, for, the, high, stability, of, the, 'Grb2-Sos', 'complex,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'Grb2', recognizes, other, structural, features, in, the, 'Sos', 'C-terminus'])].
[sujeto(['Binding', of, a, phosphotyrosine, peptide, to, the, 'SH2']), verbo([has]), complemento([no, effect, on, the, 'SH3s'])].
[sujeto(['Thus', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Grb2', to, a, receptor, or, to, an, associated, protein, phosphorylated, on, tyrosines, is, unlikely, to, activate, the, exchange, factor, activity, of, 'Sos', through, a, conformational, change, transmitted, from, the, 'SH2', to, the, 'SH3', domains])].
[sujeto(['Signaling', by, tyrosine, kinase, receptors, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, selective, interactions, between, individual, 'Src', homology, 2, '(', 'SH2)', domains, of, cytoplasmic, effectors, and, specific, phosphotyrosine, residues, in, the, activated, receptor])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, existence, in, the, hepatocyte, growth, 'factor/scatter', factor, '(', 'HGF/SF)', receptor, of, a, multifunctional, docking, site, made, of, the, tandemly, arranged, degenerate, sequence, 'YVH/NV'])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, this, site]), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['intermediate-', to, 'high-affinity', interactions, with, multiple, 'SH2-containing', signal, 'transducers,', including, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, 'kinase,', phospholipase, 'C', 'gamma,', 'pp60c-src,', and, the, 'GRB-2-Sos', complex])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, the, two, tyrosines, results, in]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, biological, 'function,', as, shown, by, abrogation, of, the, transforming, activity, in, the, oncogenic, counterpart, of, the, receptor])].
[sujeto(['The', same, bidentate, motif, is]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, the, evolutionarily, related, receptors, 'Sea', and, 'Ron,', suggesting, that, in, all, members, of, the, 'HGF/SF', receptor, 'family,', signal, transduction, is, channeled, through, a, multifunctional, binding, site])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Ras/mitogen']), verbo([activated]), complemento([protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathway, is, essential, in, the, regulation, of, cell, 'cycle,', 'differentiation,', 'growth,', cell, senescence, and, 'apoptosis,', all, of, which, are, critical, to, normal, development])].
[sujeto(['A', class, of, neurodevelopmental, 'disorders,', 'RASopathies,', is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, germline, mutations, in, genes, of, the, 'Ras/MAPK', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Through', the, use, of, whole, exome, sequencing, and]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([sequencing, of, selected, genes, in, cohorts, of, 'panel-negative', 'RASopathy', 'patients,', several, new, genes, have, been, identified])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', recent]), verbo([reports]), complemento([have, demonstrated, that, chromosomal, copy, number, variation, in, regions, encompassing, 'Ras/MAPK', pathway, genes, may, be, a, novel, pathogenetic, mechanism, expanding, the, 'RASopathies'])].
[sujeto(['Various', genetic, mutations]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, cancer, are, known, to, alter, cell, 'signaling,', but, it, is, not, clear, whether, they, dysregulate, signaling, pathways, by, altering, the, abundance, of, pathway, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, combination, of, 'RNA', sequencing, and, ultrasensitive]), verbo([targeted]), complemento(['proteomics,', we, defined, the, primary, 'components-16', core, proteins, and, 10, feedback, 'regulators-of', the, epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, '(', 'EGFR)-mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathway, in, normal, human, mammary, epithelial, cells, and, then, quantified, their, absolute, abundance, across, a, panel, of, normal, and, breast, cancer, cell, lines, as, well, as, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, core, pathway, proteins, were, present, at, very, similar, concentrations, across, all, cell, 'types,', with, a, variance, similar, to, that, of, proteins, previously, shown, to, display, conserved, abundances, across, species])].
[sujeto(['The', absolute, abundance, of, most, core, proteins, was, between, 50, ',', 0, and, 70, ',', 0, copies, per, 'cell,', but, the, adaptors, 'SOS1,', 'SOS2,', and, 'GAB1', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([at, far, lower, amounts, '(', 2000, to, 5000, copies, per, 'cell)'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, relative, stoichiometry, of, core, 'MAPK', pathway, proteins, is, very, similar, across, different, cell, 'types,', with, 'cell-specific', differences, mostly, restricted, to, variable, amounts, of, feedback, regulators, and, receptors])].
[sujeto(['We', performed, 'low-coverage', genome, and, 'high-coverage', exome, sequencing, of, 20, desmoplastic, 'melanomas,', followed, by]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([sequencing, of, 293, genes, in, a, validation, cohort, of, 42, cases])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', other, genetic, alterations, known, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'MAPK', and, 'PI3K', signaling, cascades, were, identified, in, 73, '%', of, 'samples,', affecting, 'NF1,', 'CBL,', 'ERBB2,', 'MAP2K1,', 'MAP3K1,', 'BRAF,', 'EGFR,', 'PTPN11,', 'MET,', 'RAC1,', 'SOS2,', 'NRAS', and, 'PIK3CA,', some, of, which, are, candidates, for, targeted, therapies])].
[sujeto(['Noonan', syndrome, '(', 'NS),', the, commonest, 'RASopathy,', is, genetically, heterogeneous, and]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, functional, dysregulation, of, signal, transducers, and, regulatory, proteins, with, roles, in, the, 'RAS/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', signal, transduction, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, missense, mutations, altering, 'Son', of, 'Sevenless,', 'Drosophila,', homolog, 2, '(', 'SOS2),', which, encodes, a, 'RAS', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, 'factor,', occur, in, a, small, percentage, of, subjects, with, 'NS'])].
[sujeto(['Disease-causing', mutations, affected, three]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([residues, located, in, the, 'Dbl', homology, '(', 'DH)', 'domain,', of, which, two, are, directly, involved, in, the, intramolecular, binding, network, maintaining, 'SOS2', in, its, autoinhibited, conformation])].
[sujeto(['All', mutations, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, promote, enhanced, signaling, from, 'RAS', to, 'ERK'])].
[sujeto(['Similar', to, 'NS-causing', 'SOS1', 'mutations,', the, phenotype]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'SOS2', defects, is, characterized, by, normal, development, and, 'growth,', as, well, as, marked, ectodermal, involvement])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, 'ANT', plays, an, essential, role, in, conferring, salt, tolerance, in, 'Arabidopsis'])].
[sujeto(['ant-knockout', mutants, presented, a, 'salt-tolerant', 'phenotype,', whereas, transgenic, plants]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['ANT', under, the, 35, 'S', promoter, '(', 35, 'S:ANT)', exhibited, more, sensitive, phenotypes, under, high, salt, stress])].
[sujeto(['Target', gene, analysis, revealed, that, 'ANT']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, promoter, of, 'SOS3-LIKE', 'CALCIUM', 'BINDING', 'PROTEIN', 8, '(', 'SCABP8),', which, encodes, a, putative, 'Ca(2+)', 'sensor,', thereby, inhibiting, expression, of, 'SCABP8', '(', also, known, as, 'CBL10)'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, the, salt, sensitivity, of, scabp8, is, more, prominent, in, shoot, tissues])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', experiments, indicated, that, the, mutation, of, 'SCABP8']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([the, 'ant-knockout', 'salt-tolerant', 'phenotype,', implying, that, 'ANT', functions, as, a, negative, transcriptional, regulator, of, 'SCABP8', upon, salt, stress])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, above, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'ANT', is, a, novel, regulator, of, salt, stress, and, that, 'ANT', binds, to, the, 'SCABP8', 'promoter,', mediating, salt, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Chk1', protein, kinase, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, 'DNA', damage, through, 'ATR-mediated', phosphorylation, at, multiple, 'serine-glutamine', '(', 'SQ)', residues, within, the, 'C-terminal', regulatory, 'domain,', however, the, molecular, mechanism, is, not, understood])].
[sujeto(['Modelling', indicates, a, high, probability, that, this, region, of, 'Chk1', contains, a, 'kinase-associated', 1, '(', 'KA1)', 'domain,', a, 'small,', compact, protein, fold]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, multiple, protein, kinases, including, 'SOS2,', 'AMPK', and, 'MARK3'])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', six, of, seven, 'Chk1', 'KA1', mutants, exhibit, constitutive, biological, activity, '(', 'Chk1-CA)', in, the, absence, of, 'DNA', 'damage,', profoundly]), verbo([arresting]), complemento([cells, in, 'G2', phase, of, the, cell, cycle])].
[sujeto(['Cell', cycle]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([induced, by, selected, 'Chk1-CA', mutants, depends, on, kinase, catalytic, 'activity,', which, is, increased, 'several-fold', compared, to, 'wild-type,', however, phosphorylation, of, the, key, 'ATR', regulatory, site, serine, 345, '(', 'S345)', is, not, required])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', mutations]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, putative, 'Chk1', 'KA1', domain, confer, constitutive, biological, activity, by, circumventing, the, need, for, 'ATR-mediated', positive, regulatory, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Focusing', on, salt, 'stress,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, molecular, explanation, for, this, 'well-known', fact])].
[sujeto(['A', protein, complex, consisting, of, 'GI,', a, clock, component, important, for, flowering, and, 'SOS2,', a, kinase]), verbo([activating]), complemento([the, '[', 'Na(+)]', antiporter, 'SOS1,', exists, under, no, stress, conditions])].

[sujeto(['SO2,', together, with, the, 'Ca', '(', 2, +, ')', -]), verbo([activated]), complemento([sensor, of, sodium, 'ions,', 'SOS3,', activates, 'SOS1'])].

[sujeto(['The', hyperactivated, 'T', cells, in, these, mice, show, defective, 'TCR-induced', calcium, flux, but]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['Ras/ERK', 'activation,', which, is, critical, for, disease, progression])].

[sujeto(['Adjustment', of, the, quantity, of, digested, protein, injected, into, the, mass, spectrometer]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, optimisation, is, required, as, high, quantities, of, material, led, to, a, decrease, in, protein, sequence, coverage, and, the, loss, of, some, interacting, proteins])].
[sujeto(['CBL-interacting', protein, kinases, '(', 'CIPKs)', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, many, aspects, of, plant, responses, to, abiotic, stresses])].

[sujeto(['As', a, 'result,', the, overexpression, of, both, 'MdCIPK6L', and, 'MdCIPK6LT175D', remarkably]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, tolerance, to, 'salt,', 'osmotic/drought', and, chilling, 'stresses,', but, did, not, affect, root, 'growth,', in, transgenic, 'Arabidopsis', and, apple])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', 'MdCIPK6L', overexpression, also]), verbo([conferred]), complemento([tolerance, to, 'salt,', drought, and, chilling, stresses, in, transgenic, tomatoes])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', using, an, array, of, biophysical, 'methods,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, although, the, 'Grb2', adaptor, can, potentially, bind, to, all, four, 'PXψPXR', motifs, '(', designated, herein, 'S1-S4)', located, within, the, 'Sos1', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, 'factor,', the, formation, of, the, 'Grb2-Sos1', signaling, complex, occurs, with, a, 2, :, 1, stoichiometry])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', such, bivalent]), verbo([binding]), complemento([appears, to, be, driven, by, the, association, of, the, 'Grb2', homodimer, to, only, two, of, four, potential, 'PXψPXR', motifs, within, 'Sos1', at, any, one, time])].
[sujeto(['Of', particular, interest, is, the, observation, that, of, a, possible, six, pairwise, combinations, in, which, 'S1-S4', motifs, may]), verbo([act]), complemento([in, concert, for, the, docking, of, the, 'Grb2', homodimer, through, bivalent, 'binding,', only, 'S1', and, 'S3,', 'S1', and, 'S4,', 'S2', and, 'S4,', and, 'S3', and, 'S4', do, 'so,', while, pairwise, combinations, of, sites, 'S1', and, 'S2', and, sites, 'S2', and, 'S3', appear, to, afford, only, monovalent, binding])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', the, presence, of, multiple]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, within, 'Sos1', appears, to, provide, a, physical, route, for, 'Grb2', to, hop, in, a, 'flip-flop', manner, from, one, site, to, the, next, through, facilitated, 'diffusion,', and, such, rapid, exchange, forms, the, basis, of, positive, cooperativity, driving, the, bivalent, binding, of, 'Grb2', to, 'Sos1', with, high, affinity])].
[sujeto(['Arabidopsis']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, favorite, model, system, for, plant, biologist])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'endeavor,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, identified, 'SOS', family, members, from, 'Brassica', juncea, in, our, laboratory, and, reported, their, salinity, responsive, transcriptional, induction, in, seedlings, of, various, diploid, and, amphidiploids, species])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([carried, out, detailed, time, kinetics, for, 'BjSOS3', expression, in, a, salinity, tolerant, 'B'])].

[sujeto(['Similar', to, its, ortholog, from, 'Arabidopsis', 'thaliana,', the, modeled, 'BjSOS3', protein, show, typical, features, of, a, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, with, four, conserved, 'EF-hands'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, attempted, to, study, the, binding, of, 'SOS3', protein, with, the, modeled, 'SOS2', protein])].

[sujeto(['In', situ, localization, of, 'BjSOS3-GFP', fusion, protein, in, onion, peel]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, its, presence, strongly, in, plasma, membrane, as, well, as, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([leads]), complemento([presented, in, the, paper, will, assist, in, understanding, and, establishing, the, 'SOS', signaling, machinery, in, 'B'])].
[sujeto(['However,', genomic, and, cDNA, sequences, of, the, 'HvCBL4', alleles, were, 'obtained,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([a, single, 'Ala111Thr', amino, acid, substitution, difference, in, the, encoded, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', position, in, 'SOS3', corresponding, to, the, barley, substitution, does, not]), verbo([participate]), complemento([directly, in, 'Ca(2+)', 'binding,', 'post-translational', modifications, or, interaction, with, the, 'SOS2', signalling, partner])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'Thr111', but, not, 'Ala111', forms, a, predicted, hydrogen, bond, with, a, neighbouring, 'α-helix,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([potential, implications, for, the, overall, structure, and, function, of, the, barley, protein])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, sequence, 'analysis,', the, salt, overly, sensitive, '(', 'SOS1)', gene]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, function, as, a, 'Na(+)/H(+)', antiporter, located, at, the, plasma, membrane, of, plant, 'cells,', being, expressed, mostly, in, the, meristem, zone, of, the, root, and, in, the, parenchyma, cells, surrounding, the, vascular, tissue, of, the, stem])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, amiloride]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, intracellular, acidification, and, lower, net, 'H(+)', flux, in, 'WT', plants, and, to, a, decrease, in, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', in, 'WT', and, sos1, plants])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, 'SOS1', transporter, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'H(+)', influx, into, the, meristem, zone, of, 'Arabidopsis', 'roots,', or, it, may, function, as, a, 'Na(+)/H(+)', antiporter])].
[sujeto(['Amiloride', affects, 'SOS1', and, other, 'Na(+)/H(+)', antiporters, in, plant, cells, because, of, its, ability, to]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([the, 'H(+)', gradient, across, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['SOS2', is, known, to, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'calcium-SOS3', and, by, phosphorylation, at, its, activation, loop])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', changing, 'Ser228', to, 'Asp', to, mimic, the, autophosphorylation]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([substrate, phosphorylation, by, 'SOS2'])].

[sujeto(['Son', of, sevenless, '(', 'Sos)', proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, 'NMDA-induced', 'Erk', activation, in, neurons, of, young, mice])].
[sujeto(['However,', contribution, of, each, of, the, two, 'Sos', 'isoforms,', 'Sos1', and, 'Sos2,']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, clarified])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, no, defect, in, 'Erk', phosphorylation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'NMDA', treatment, of, cortical, neuronal, cultures, from, 'Sos2-/-', newborn, mice])].
[sujeto(['These', results, imply, that, 'Sos1', is, the, major, regulator, of, these, 'well-known', neuronal, 'Sos', functions, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, novel, function, for, 'Sos2', in, neurons, remains, to, be, determined])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, physiological, role, of, endogenous, 'MAPK-activating', death, 'domain-containing', protein, '(', 'MADD),', a, splice, variant, of, the, 'IG20', 'gene,', that, can]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'TNFR1', in, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-alpha', '(', 'TNFalpha)-induced', activation, of, 'NF-kappaB,', 'MAPK,', 'ERK1/2,', 'JNK,', and, p38])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'exon-specific', short, hairpin, 'RNAs']), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['lentiviruses,', we, knocked, down, the, expression, of, all, 'IG20', splice, variants, or, 'MADD,', which, is, overexpressed, in, cancer, cells])].

[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, the, essential, role, of, 'MADD', in, protecting, cancer, cells, from, 'TNFalpha-induced', apoptosis, by, specifically]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['MAPKs', through, 'Grb2', and, 'Sos1/2', 'recruitment,', and, its, potential, as, a, novel, cancer, therapeutic, target])].
[sujeto(['Calcium', signals]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([a, multitude, of, plant, responses, to, external, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Calcineurin', 'B-like', '(', 'CBL)', proteins, and, their]), verbo([target]), complemento(['kinases,', 'CBL-interacting', protein, kinases, '(', 'CIPKs),', represent, important, relays, in, plant, calcium, signaling])].
[sujeto(['CBL']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'CIPK', through, a, conserved, motif, '(', 'NAF/FISL', 'motif)', within, the, 'C-terminal', regulatory, domain])].
[sujeto(['Ca(2+)', are, coordinated, within, four, 'EF', hands, in, 'AtCBL2', in]), verbo([bound]), complemento([form])].
[sujeto(['Structural', comparison, of, the, two, structures, shows, that, the, recognition, of, 'CBL', by, 'CIPK', is, performed, in, a, similar, 'manner,', but, inherent, interactions]), verbo([confer]), complemento([binding, affinity, and, specificity])].
[sujeto(['In', 'plants,', the, calcineurin, 'B-like', protein, '(', 'CBL)', family, represents, a, unique, group, of, calcium, sensors, and, plays, a, key, role, in, decoding, calcium, transients, by, specifically]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, and, regulating, a, family, of, protein, kinases, '(', 'CIPKs)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, the, 'CBL', protein, 'CBL10', functions, as, a, crucial, regulator, of, salt, tolerance, in, 'Arabidopsis'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, 'Na(+)', content, of, the, cbl10, 'mutant,', unlike, other, 'salt-sensitive', mutants, identified, thus, 'far,', was, significantly, lower, than, in, the, wild, type, under, either, normal, or, 'high-salt', 'conditions,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'CBL10', mediates, a, novel, 'Ca(2+)-signaling', pathway, for, salt, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', the, 'CBL10', protein, physically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, 'salt-tolerance', factor, 'CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2),', and, the, 'CBL10-CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2)', complex, is, associated, with, the, vacuolar, compartments, that, are, responsible, for, salt, storage, and, detoxification, in, plant, cells])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CBL10', and, 'CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2)', constitute, a, novel, 'salt-tolerance', pathway, that, regulates, the, 'sequestration/compartmentalization', of, 'Na(+)', in, plant, cells])].
[sujeto(['Because', 'CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2)', also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'CBL4', '(', 'SOS3)', and, regulates, salt, export, across, the, plasma, 'membrane,', our, study, identifies, 'CIPK24', '(', 'SOS2)', as, a, 'multi-functional', protein, kinase, that, regulates, different, aspects, of, salt, tolerance, by, interacting, with, distinct, 'CBL', calcium, sensors])].
[sujeto(['Salt', stress]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, degradation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'proteins,', and, affects, the, localization, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, λ])].
[sujeto(['Both', the, modulation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, protein, stability, and, the, subcellular, localization, of, these, proteins, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, salt, tolerance, in, plants])].
[sujeto(['Salt', tolerance, in, plants, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, multiple, signaling, 'pathways,', including, the, salt, overly, sensitive, '(', 'SOS)', 'pathway,', of, which, the, 'SOS2', protein, is, a, key, component])].
[sujeto(['SOS2', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([under, salt, stress, to, enhance, salt, tolerance, in, plants])].
[sujeto(['Both', proteins]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'SOS2', to, inhibit, its, kinase, activity, under, normal, growth, conditions])].
[sujeto(['In', response, to, salt, 'stress,', 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, dissociate, from, 'SOS2,']), verbo([releasing]), complemento([its, activity, and, activating, the, 'SOS', pathway, to, confer, salt, tolerance, '(', 'Zhou', et, al])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, salt, stress, promotes, the, degradation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, λ, and, 'κ,', at, least, in, part, via, the, actions, of, 'SOS3-like', calcium, binding, protein, 8, /, 'calcineurin-B-like10,', and, also, decreases, the, plasma, membrane, '(', 'PM)', localization, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, λ])].
[sujeto(['Salt', stress, also, partially]), verbo([represses]), complemento([the, interaction, of, 'SOS2', and, 14, -, 3, -, 3, λ, at, the, 'PM,', but, activates, 'PM-localized', 'SOS2'])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that,', in, 'plants,', both, the, modulation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, stability, and, the, subcellular, localization, of, these, proteins, in, response, to, salt, stress, are, important, for, 'SOS2', activation, and, salt, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, biological, roles, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, in, modulating, salt, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, the, mapping, to]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([sequence, tags, '(', 'ESTs),', 52.6, '%', unigenes, are, novel, compared, to, 'EST', data, available, for, 'B'])].
[sujeto(['Of', 'these,', 587, ',', mainly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'ROS', 'detoxification,', sulfur, assimilation, and, calcium, signaling, 'pathways,', are, up, regulated])].
[sujeto(['Notable', of, these, is, 'RSA1', '(', 'SHORT', 'ROOT', 'IN', 'SALT', 'MEDIUM', 1, ')', 'INTERACTING', 'TRANSCRIPTION', 'FACTOR', 1, '(', 'RITF1)', homolog, up]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, &, 'gt;100', folds, in, response, to, stress])].

[sujeto(['CS52', compared, to, 'salt-sensitive']), verbo([cultivar]), complemento([even, under, normal, growth, conditions])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, one, 'SNF1-related', protein, 'kinase3-type', protein, 'kinase,', 'SOS2-like', protein, kinase5, '(', 'PKS5),', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'ABA', signal, transduction, via, the, phosphorylation, of, an, interacting, 'protein,', abscisic, 'acid-insensitive5', '(', 'ABI5)'])].

[sujeto(['Plant', cells]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, specific, protective, molecular, machinery, against, environmental, stresses])].
[sujeto(['The', family, of, 'CBL-interacting', protein, kinases, '(', 'CIPK)', and, their]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['activators,', the, calcium, sensors, calcineurin, 'B-like', '(', 'CBLs),', work, together, to, decode, calcium, signals, elicited, by, stress, situations])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([biochemical, data, showing, that, although, 'CIPK23', is, intrinsically, inactive, and, requires, an, external, 'stimulation,', 'CIPK24/SOS2', displays, basal, activity])].

[sujeto(['parvula,', and]), verbo([found]), complemento([evidence, that, changes, in, 'CPA1-mediated', 'Na(+)', extrusion, may, contribute, to, the, salt, tolerance, of, both, species])].

[sujeto([salsugineum, '(', 'EsSOS1)']), verbo([confers]), complemento([greater, salt, tolerance, than, 'SOS1', from, 'Sc'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Arabidopsis', 'SOS2', family, of, 'twenty-six', protein, kinases, '(', 'CIPKs),', their]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['activators,', the, 'SOS3', family, of, ten, 'calcium-binding', proteins, '(', 'CBLs)', and, protein, phosphatases, type, 2, 'C', '(', 'PP2C),', function, together, in, decoding, calcium, signals, elicited, by, different, environmental, stimuli])].

[sujeto(['The', available, structural, information]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, general, regulatory, mechanism, in, which, calcium, perception, by, 'CBLs', and, kinase, activation, is, coupled])].
[sujeto(['Genes']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, relevant, functions, for, environmental, adaptation, can, be, considered, primary, candidates, for, their, variation, having, been, shaped, by, natural, selection])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([performed, electron, microscopy, and, 'single-particle', reconstruction, of, negatively, stained, 'full-length', and, active, 'SOS1'])].

[sujeto(['The', close, contacts, between, the, 'TM', and, the, cytosolic, domains]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, link, between, regulation, and, transport, activity, of, the, antiporter])].
[sujeto(['Salinity', treatment, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([relative, water, content, '(', 'RWC),', membrane, stability, index, '(', 'MSI)', and, chlorophyll, '(', 'Chl)', content, in, leaves, and, potassium, '(', 'K)', content, in, 'leaf,', stem, and, root, of, all, the, genotypes])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, sodium, '(', 'Na)', content]), verbo([increased]), complemento([under, salinity, stress, in, all, the, plant, parts, in, all, the, 'genotypes,', 'however,', the, increase, was, less, in, 'CS', 52, and, 'CS', 54, ',', which, also, showed, higher, 'K/Na', 'ratio,', and, thus, more, favourable, cellular, environment])].
[sujeto(['Sequence', analyses, of, partial, cDNAs, showed, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([nature, of, these, 'genes,', and, their, intra, and, intergenic, relatedness])].
[sujeto(['A', general, regulatory, mechanism, between, these, two, families, is, that, 'SCaBP', calcium, sensors]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['PKS', kinases, by, interacting, with, their, 'FISL', motif])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrated, that, phosphorylation, of, 'SCaBPs', by, their, functional]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['PKSs', is, another, common, regulatory, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['This', serine, residue, is]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([within, the, 'PFPF', motif, at, the, 'C', terminus, of, 'SCaBP', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, this, site, of, 'SCaBP8', by, 'SOS2']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, determined, previously])].
[sujeto(['We', further, showed, that, 'CIPK23/PKS17']), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento(['CBL1/SCaBP5', and, 'CBL9/SCaBP7', and, 'PKS5', phosphorylated, 'SCaBP1', at, the, same, site, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, 'SCaBP', phosphorylation, by, their]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['PKS', kinases, is, a, critical, component, of, the, 'SCaBP-PKS', regulatory, pathway, in, 'Arabidopsis'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'SOS1', is]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([in, a, resting, state, by, a, 'C-terminal', 'auto-inhibitory', domain, that, is, the, target, of, 'SOS2-SOS3'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'auto-inhibitory', domain]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([intramolecularly, with, an, adjacent, domain, of, 'SOS1', that, is, essential, for, activity])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'SOS3', and, 'SCaBP8']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, and, activate, 'SOS2'])].
[sujeto(['SCaBP8', is]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([by, 'SOS2', at, plasma, membrane, '(', 'PM)', under, salt, stress])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, describe, that, 'SOS2']), verbo([has]), complemento([high, binding, affinity, and, catalytic, efficiency, to, 'SCaBP8,', suggesting, that, phosphorylation, of, 'SCaBP8', by, 'SOS2', perhaps, occurs, rapidly, in, salt, condition])].

[sujeto(['SOS2']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'SOS3', and, 'SCaBP8', with, its, 'FISL', motif, at, 'C-terminus'])].
[sujeto(['However,', luciferase, activity, complement, assay, indicates, that, 'SOS2', 'N-terminal', is, also, essential, for]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, these, proteins, in, plant])].
[sujeto(['Irrigating', the, plants, with, a, low, concentration, of, 'NaCl', successfully]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, reduction, in, chlorotic, symptoms, and, in, the, impairment, of, the, photosynthetic, processes, when, the, plants, were, exposed, to, subsequent, 'high-dose', salt, treatment])].

[sujeto(['The', present, study]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, responses, of, wheat, plants, to, acclimation, with, low, level, of, salt, and, to, treatment, with, high, doses, of, salt, may, be, fundamentally, different])].
[sujeto(['Salt-induced', phosphorylation, of, 'MdVHA-B1', protein, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'MdSOS2L1', protein, 'kinase,', and, thereby, increasing, malate, content, in, apple])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, molecular, mechanism, by, which, salinity]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([this, process, is, poorly, understood])].

[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, new, insight, into, the, mechanism, by, which, 'MdSOS2L1', phosphorylates, 'MdVHA-B1', to, modulate, malate, accumulation, in, response, to, salinity, in, apple])].
[sujeto(['RASopathies', or, 'RAS/mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', syndromes, are, a, group, of, phenotypically, overlapping, syndromes]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, germline, mutations, that, encode, components, of, the, 'RAS/MAPK', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', novel, gene, 'variants,', including, 'RIT1,', 'RRAS,', 'RASA2,', 'A2ML1,', 'SOS2', and, 'LZTR1,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, associated, with, 'RASopathies,', further, expanding, the, disease, entity])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we, summarize, the, novel, genes, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, associated, with, 'RASopathies', and, highlight, the, cardiovascular, abnormalities, that, may, arise, in, affected, individuals])].
[sujeto(['Cyclin-dependent', protein, kinases, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, many, crucial, cellular, processes, and, aspects, of, plant, growth, and, 'development,', but, their, precise, roles, in, abiotic, stress, responses, are, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here,', 'Arabidopsis', thaliana, 'CYCLIN-DEPENDENT', 'KINASE', 'G2', '(', 'CDKG2)', was, shown, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, negative, regulator, of, the, salinity, stress, 'response,', as, well, as, being, involved, in, the, control, of, flowering, time])].
[sujeto(['GUS', expression, experiments, based, on, a, 'pCDKG2::GUS', transgene]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'CDKG2', was, expressed, throughout, plant, 'development,', with, especially, high, expression, levels, recorded, in, the, seed, and, in, the, flower])].
[sujeto(['The', 'loss-of-function', of, 'CDKG2']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, increased, tolerance, of, salinity, stress, and, the, 'up-regulation', of, the, known, 'stress-responsive', genes, 'SOS1,', 'SOS2,', 'SOS3,', 'NHX3,', 'RD29B,', 'ABI2,', 'ABI3,', 'MYB15', and, 'P5CS1'])].

[sujeto(['Our', data, connect, 'CDKG2', to, undescribed, functions, related, to, salt, stress, tolerance, and, flowering, time, through, the, regulation, of, specific]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto(['Noonan', syndrome, is, an, autosomal, 'dominant,', multisystemic, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, dysregulation, of, the, 'RAS/mitogen', activated, protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['The', identification, of, novel, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'Noonan', syndrome, has, become, increasingly, 'challenging,', since, they, might, be, responsible, for, very, small, fractions, of, the, cases])].
[sujeto(['A', cohort, of, 50, 'Brazilian', probands, negative, for, pathogenic, variants, in, the, known, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'Noonan', syndrome, was, tested, through, 'whole-exome', sequencing, along, with, the, relatives, in, the, familial, cases])].
[sujeto(['SOS2', and, 'LZTR1', variants, were, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, segregate, in, one, 'American', and, one, 'Polish', family])].

[sujeto(['While', 'SOS2', is, a, natural, 'candidate,', because, of, its, homology, with, 'SOS1,', the, functional, role, of, 'LZTR1', in, the, 'RAS/MAPK', pathway, is, not, 'known,', and, it, could, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, without, the, large, pedigrees])].
[sujeto(['Among', these, 'applications,', 'gene-', and, 'enzyme-replacement', strategies, are, promising, approaches, to, treat, inherited, diseases, that, may, benefit, from, protein, engineering, 'techniques,', even, though, these, beneficial, effects]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, largely, unexplored])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we, apply, a, 'sequence-alignment', statistics, procedure, '(', 'consensus-based', 'approach)', to, improve, the, activity, and, stability, of, the, human, 'AGT', '(', 'alanine-glyoxylate', 'aminotransferase)', 'protein,', an, enzyme, which]), verbo([causes]), complemento(['PH1', '(', primary, hyperoxaluria, 'type\240\I)', upon, mutation])].

[sujeto(['The', structure, of, 'AGT-RHEAM']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([changes, at, the, dimer, interface, and, improved, electrostatic, interactions, responsible, for, increased, kinetic, stability])].
[sujeto(['Consensus-based', variants]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([the, overall, protein, 'fold,', crystallized, more, easily, and, improved, the, expression, as, soluble, proteins, in, two, different, systems, '[', 'AGT', and, 'CIPK24', '(', 'CBL-interacting', 'serine/threonine-protein', 'kinase)', 'SOS2', '(', 'salt-overly-sensitive', 2, ')', ']'])].

[sujeto(['To', help, identify, the, genetic, networks]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, seed, 'ionome,', changes, in, elemental, concentrations, were, evaluated, using, mutants, corresponding, to, 760, genes, as, well, as, 10, naturally, occurring, accessions])].

[sujeto(['In', a, comparison, of, nine, different, accessions, to, a, 'Col-0', 'reference,', eight, accessions, were, observed, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([reproducible, differences, in, elemental, 'concentrations,', seven, of, which, were, dependent, on, specific, soil, conditions])].
[sujeto([thaliana, seed, ionome, is, distinct, from, the, vegetative, 'ionome,', and, that, elemental, analysis, is, a, sensitive, approach, to, identify, genes, controlling, ion, 'homeostasis,', including, those, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([gene, 'expression,', 'phospho-regulation,', and, ion, transport])].
[sujeto(['Gene', expression, pattern, of, two, important, regulatory, 'proteins,', salt, overly, sensitive, 2, '(', 'SOS2)', and, plasma, membrane, protein, 3, -, 1, '(', 'PMP3-1),']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, ion, 'homeostasis,', was, analyzed, in, two, 'salinity-contrasting', sunflower, '(', 'Helianthus', annuus, 'L'])].
[sujeto(['Both', tolerant, and, moderately, tolerant, lines, showed, a, gradual]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'SOS2', expression, in, sunflower, root, tissues])].

[sujeto(['To']), verbo([enhance]), complemento(['CIPK3', enzyme, 'activity,', a, constitutively, active, 'form,', 'CIPK3T183D,', was, generated, by, a, 'Thr(183)', to, 'Asp(183)', substitution, in, the, activation, loop])].

[sujeto(['Protein', kinases, play, an, important, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, response, to, abiotic, stress, in, plant])].

[sujeto(['Sequence', alignment, and, phylogenetic, analysis, showed, that, it, is, highly, similar, with, 'Arabidopsis', 'AtSOS2', and, contained, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([domains, and, motifs])].

[sujeto(['Northern', blot, analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'BnSOS2', is, 'salt-inducible'])].
[sujeto(['SOS2', '(', salt, overly, sensitive, 2, ')', is, a, 'serine/threonine', protein, kinase]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, salt, tolerance, in, 'Arabidopsis', thaliana])].
[sujeto(['Deletion', analysis]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, discovery, of, a, novel, protein, domain, of, 37, amino, acid, 'residues,', designated, as, the, protein, phosphatase, interaction, '(', 'PPI)', 'motif,', of, 'SOS2', that, is, necessary, and, sufficient, for, interaction, with, 'ABI2'])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, establish, the, 'PPI', motif, and, the, protein, kinase, interaction, domain, as, novel, protein, interaction, domains, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([the, binding, between, the, 'SOS2', family, of, protein, kinases, and, the, 'ABI1/2', family, of, protein, phosphatases])].
[sujeto(['When', under, salt, 'stress,', plants]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([a, high, concentration, of, 'K(+)', and, a, low, concentration, of, 'Na(+)', in, the, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['They', do, this, by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, expression, and, activity, of, 'K(+)', and, 'Na(+)', transporters, and, of, 'H(+)', pumps, that, generate, the, driving, force, for, transport])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'salt-stress', sensors, remain, 'elusive,', some, of, the, intermediary, signaling, components]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified])].
[sujeto(['Evidence']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, a, protein, kinase, complex, consisting, of, the, myristoylated, 'calcium-binding', protein, 'SOS3', and, the, 'serine/threonine', protein, kinase, 'SOS2', is, activated, by, a, 'salt-stress-elicited', calcium, signal])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Arabidopsis', 'Salt', 'Overly', 'Sensitive', 2, '(', 'SOS2)', gene, encodes, a, 'serine/threonine', '(', 'Thr)', protein, kinase, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, a, critical, component, of, the, salt, stress, signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['SOS2', contains, a, 'sucrose-non-fermenting', protein, kinase, 1, /, 'AMP-activated', protein, 'kinase-like', 'N-terminal', catalytic, domain, with, an, activation, loop, and, a, unique, 'C-terminal', regulatory, domain, with, an, 'FISL', motif, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, calcium, sensor, 'Salt', 'Overly', 'Sensitive', 3])].

[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'SOS2', could, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([not, only, by, the, 'Thr-168', to, 'Asp', mutation, but, also, by, a, 'serine-156', or, 'tyrosine-175', to, 'Asp', mutation, within, the, activation, loop])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, into, the, regulation, and, biochemical, properties, of, 'SOS2', and, the, 'SOS2', subfamily, of, protein, kinases])].
[sujeto(['In', 'Arabidopsis', 'thaliana,', the, 'Salt', 'Overly', 'Sensitive', 2, '(', 'SOS2)', gene, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, intracellular, 'Na(+)', and, 'K(+)', homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'SOS2']), verbo([cause]), complemento(['Na(+)', and, 'K(+)', imbalance, and, render, plants, more, sensitive, toward, growth, inhibition, by, high, 'Na(+)', and, low, 'K(+)', environments])].
[sujeto(['Sequence', analyses, of, sos2, mutant, alleles]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, both, the, 'N-terminal', catalytic, domain, and, the, 'C-terminal', regulatory, domain, of, 'SOS2', are, functionally, essential])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Arabidopsis', thaliana, 'SOS2', and, 'SOS3', genes, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, intracellular, 'Na(+)', and, 'K(+)', homeostasis, and, plant, tolerance, to, high, 'Na(+)', and, low, 'K(+)', environments])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, 'SOS3', physically, interacts, with, and, activates, 'SOS2', protein, kinase])].
[sujeto(['Biochemically,', 'SOS2']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'SOS3', in, the, yeast, 'two-hybrid', system, and, in, vitro, binding, assays])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'C-terminal', regulatory, domain, of, 'SOS2'])].
[sujeto(['SOS3']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['SOS2', protein, kinase, activity, in, a, 'Ca(2+)-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Genome-wide', association, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, &, 'gt;50', common, variants, associated, with, kidney, 'function,', but, these, variants, do, not, fully, explain, the, variation, in, eGFR])].
[sujeto(['In', 'single-variant', 'analyses,', we, identified, single, nucleotide, polymorphisms, at, seven, new, loci]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, eGFRcrea, '(', 'PPM1J,', 'EDEM3,', 'ACP1,', 'SPEG,', 'EYA4,', 'CYP1A1,', and, 'ATXN2L;', 'PStage1&lt;3'])].
[sujeto(['These', developmental, abnormalities]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, altered, blood, clearance, rate, and, heightened, prevalence, of, edema])].
[sujeto(['This', study, expands, the, number, of, loci]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, kidney, function, and, identifies, novel, genes, with, potential, roles, in, kidney, formation])].
[sujeto(['Soil', salinity, covers, a, large, part, of, the, arable, land, of, the, world, and, is, a, major, factor, for, yield]), verbo([losses]), complemento([in, 'salt-sensitive', 'crops,', such, as, rice])].
[sujeto(['Different', gene, families, that]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, salinity, have, been, identified, in, 'rice,', but, limited, success, has, been, achieved, in, developing, 'salt-tolerant', cultivars])].
[sujeto(['Introgression', of, the, identified, alleles, from, wild, relatives, may]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, salt, tolerance, and, consequently, rice, production, in, the, 'salinity-affected', areas])].
[sujeto(['Non-uniform', root, salinity]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, 'Na(+)efflux,', water, 'use,', and, growth, of, the, root, in, 'non-saline', 'side,', which, may, be, regulated, by, some, form, of, signaling, induced, by, the, 'high-salinity', side])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, signaling, and, its, specific, function]), verbo([have]), complemento([remained, unknown])].
[sujeto([',', we, showed, that, the, 'up-regulated', expression, of, sodium, 'efflux-related', genes, '(', 'SOS1,', 'SOS2,', 'PMA1,', and, 'PMA2)', and, water, 'uptake-related', genes, '(', 'PIP1', and, 'PIP2)', was, possibly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, elevated, 'Na(+)', efflux, and, water, use, in, the, the, roots, in, the, 'non-saline', side])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([level, of, indole, acetic, acid, '(', 'IAA)', in, the, 'non-saline', side, was, the, likely, cause, of, the, increased, root, growth])].
[sujeto(['Also,', the, abscisic, acid, '(', 'ABA)', and, 'H2O2', contents, in, roots, in, the, 'non-saline', side, 'increased,', possibly, due, to, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, their, key, biosynthesis, 'genes,', 'NCED', and, 'RBOHC,', and, the, decreased, expression, of, 'ABA', catabolic, 'CYP707A', genes])].

[sujeto(['Both', exogenous, 'ABA', and, 'H2O2']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'SOS1,', 'PIP1;7', ',', 'PIP2;2,', and, 'PIP2;10', 'genes,', but, these, were, 'down-regulated', by, fluridone, and, 'DPI,', suggesting, that, 'H2O2', and, 'ABA', are, important, signals, for, increasing, root, 'Na(+)', efflux, and, water, uptake, in, the, roots, in, the, 'non-saline', side])].
[sujeto(['Structural', and, linkage, analysis, by, 1, 'D', 'NMR', '(', '(', 1, ')', 'H', 'NMR', and, '(', 13, ')', 'C', 'NMR),', and, 2, 'D', 'NMR', '(', 'COSY,', 'TOCSY,', 'HSQC,', and, elevated, temperature, 'HMBC)']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'PPc', was, a, 'RG-I-like', pectic, 'polysaccharide,', branched, at, the, 'C-4', of, some, of, the, '(', about, 29, '%', 'of)', rhamnosyl, 'units,', with, relatively, long, 'β-1,4-d-galactan', side, chains, to, which, were, 'attached,', through, the, 'C-3', of, 'β-d-Gal,', terminal, non, reducing, 'α-Araf', units])].
[sujeto(['The', results, of, surface, plasmon, resonance, '(', 'SPR)', show, that, 'PPc']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, two, types, of, 'lectin,', 'Ricinus', communis, agglutinin, 120, '(', 'RCA120)', and, 'Galectin-3', '(', 'Gal-3)'])].
[sujeto(['These']), verbo([binding]), complemento([studies, show, quick, association, and, slow, dissociation, with, a, moderate, binding, affinity, between, 'PPc', and, 'Gal-3', of, 1.26, μM])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, between, 'PPc', and, 'Gal-3']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, potential, use, of, pumpkin, pectic, polysaccharide, as, a, 'Gal-3', inhibitor, in, functional, food, or, drug, development, applications])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, studies, showed, that, 'ASKP-1', markedly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, release, of, cytotoxic, molecules, '(', 'NO', and, 'ROS)', and, secretion, of, the, cytokines, '(', 'TNF-α,', 'INF-β,', and, 'IL-6)', and, significantly, enhanced, the, phagocytosis, of, 'RAW264'])].

[sujeto(['The', extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', signaling, pathway, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, 'Langerhans', cell, histiocytosis, '(', 'LCH)', 'histiocytes,', but, only, 60, '%', of, cases, carry, somatic, activating, mutations, of, 'BRAF'])].

[sujeto(['Targeted', cancer, therapies, often]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['"', 'outlier"', responses, in, molecularly, defined, patient, subsets])].

[sujeto(['Ret/PTC', 'rearrangements,', 'RAS', and, 'BRAF', 'mutations,', the, main, 'non-overlapping', genetic, alterations, all]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, 'MAPK', cascade, 'activation,', are, cumulatively, identified, in, 60, -, 80, '%', of, 'PTCs'])].
[sujeto(['We', therefore, attempted, to, evaluate, the, mutational, status, of, genes, encoding, other, members, of, 'RAF', family, known, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([upstream, of, 'MAPKs,', 'ARAF', and, 'CRAF', '(', 'RAF-1)'])].
[sujeto(['Deregulation', of, 'RAS', signal, transduction]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, malignant, growth, of, human, cancer, cells])].

[sujeto(['We', also, performed, mutation, analysis, of, the, corresponding]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([regions, in, the, 'ARAF', and, 'RAF-1', genes])].

[sujeto(['Unfortunately,', neuroblastoma, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([lost, p53, function, often, has, a, highly, 'treatment-resistant', phenotype, leading, to, tragic, outcomes])].

[sujeto(['Oncogenic', activation, of, protein, kinase, 'BRAF', drives, tumor, growth, by]), verbo([promoting]), complemento(['mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathway, signaling])].

[sujeto(['Autophagy', plays, a, critical, role, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cell, homeostasis, in, response, to, various, stressors, through, protein, conjugation, and, activation, of, 'lysosome-dependent', degradation])].
[sujeto(['MAP1LC3B/LC3B', '(', 'microtubule-']), verbo([associated]), complemento([protein, 1, light, chain, 3, 'β)', is, conjugated, with, phosphatidylethanolamine, '(', 'PE)', in, the, membranes, and, regulates, initiation, of, autophagy, through, interaction, with, many, 'autophagy-related', proteins, possessing, an, 'LC3-interacting', region, '(', 'LIR)', 'motif,', which, is, composed, of, 2, hydrophobic, amino, acids, '(', tryptophan, and, 'leucine)', separated, by, 2, 'non-conserved', amino, acids, '(', 'WXXL)'])].

[sujeto(['Many', edible, mushrooms]), verbo([have]), complemento([become, attractive, as, '"', health, 'foods"', and, as, source, materials, for, immunomodulators])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'PCPS']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, capacity, to, activate, human, 'DCs', via, multiple, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, the, benefits, of, combined, targeted, therapy, with, a, 'RAF-inhibitor', '(', 'Dabrafenib)', and, a, 'MEK-inhibitor', '(', 'Trametinib)', in, treating, 'V600', 'BRAF', mutant, 'cancers,', including, 'NSCLC'])].

[sujeto(['Previous', results]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'Newcastle', disease, virus, '(', 'NDV)', downregulates, the, intracellular, 'Raf', kinase, inhibitor, protein, '(', 'RKIP)', expression, for, efficient, 'replication,', suggesting, that, this, molecular, may, be, a, suitable, target, for, antiviral, intervention])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', we, investigated, whether, or, not, the, 'Raf', kinase, inhibitor, 'V', '(', 'RKIV),', which, functions, in, the, same, way, as, 'RKIP', by]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, intracellular, 'Raf', 'kinase,', is, able, to, suppress, the, propagation, of, enzootic, virulent, 'NDV', 'in\240\vitro', and, 'in\240\vivo'])].

[sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, dimer, interface, region, in, the, 'RAF', kinase, domain, that, is, also, conserved, in, 'KSR,', a, scaffolding, protein, that, binds, 'RAF,', 'MEK', and, 'ERK'])].
[sujeto(['Especially', little, is, known, about, the, molecular, mechanism]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, selection, of, the, dimerization, partner])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'Ras-dependent', binding, of, the, tumour, suppressor, 'DiRas3', to, 'C-RAF', inhibits, the, 'C-RAF:B-RAF', heterodimerization])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'DiRas3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'KSR1', independently, of, its, interaction, with, activated, 'Ras', and, 'RAF'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, depending, on, the, local, stoichiometry, between, 'DiRas3', and, oncogenic, 'Ras,', 'DiRas3', can, either, enhance, homodimerization, of, 'KSR1', or, recruit, 'KSR1', to, the, 'Ras:C-RAF', complex, and, thereby, reduce, the, availability, of, 'C-RAF', for, binding, to, 'B-RAF'])].
[sujeto(['This', 'mechanism,', which, is, shared, between, 'A-RAF', and, 'C-RAF,', may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, 'Ras12V-induced', cell, transformation, by, 'DiRas3'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, precise, mechanotransduction, mechanism, that]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([the, anabolic, reaction, of, osteoblasts, is, largely, unknown])].

[sujeto(['Plant', perception, of, 'pathogen-associated', molecular, patterns, '(', 'PAMPs)', and, other, environmental, stresses]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([transient, ion, fluxes, at, the, plasma, membrane])].

[sujeto(['Since', the, discovery, of, 'B-Raf', 'proto-oncogene', '(', 'BRAF)', 'V600E', mutations, in, histiocytic, 'neoplasms,', diverse, kinase, alterations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, uncovered, in, 'BRAF', 'V600E-wildtype', histiocytoses])].
[sujeto(['These', kinase, alterations, include]), verbo([activating]), complemento([mutations, in, 'A-Raf', 'proto-oncogene,', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, 1, ',', neuroblastoma, rat, sarcoma, viral, oncogene, 'homolog,', 'Kirsten', rat, sarcoma, viral, oncogene, 'homolog,', and, 'phosphatidylinositol-4,5-bisphosphate', 3, 'kinase,', catalytic, subunit, α, kinases, in, 'LCH', and, 'non-LCH;', 'BRAF,', anaplastic, lymphoma, receptor, tyrosine, 'kinase,', and, neurotrophic, tyrosine, 'kinase,', receptor, type, 1, 'fusions,', as, well, as, the, 'Ets', variant, 3, -, nuclear, receptor, coactivator, 2, fusion, in, 'non-LCH;', and, mutations, in, the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, 1, and, 'Harvey', rat, sarcoma, viral, oncogene, homolog, kinases, in, 'LCH', and, histiocytic, 'sarcoma,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['These', discoveries]), verbo([have]), complemento([refined, the, understanding, of, the, histiocytoses, as, 'clonal,', myeloid, neoplasms, driven, by, constitutive, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, signaling, and, identified, molecular, therapeutic, targets, with, promising, clinical, responses, to, rapidly, accelerated, fibrosarcoma, and, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, inhibition])].
[sujeto(['Genomic', analyses, over, the, last, 6, years]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, targetable, kinase, alterations, in, 'BRAF', 'V600E-wildtype', histiocytic, neoplasms])].
[sujeto(['B-Raf', represents, a, critical, physiological, regulator, of, the, 'Ras/RAF/MEK/ERK-pathway', and, a, pharmacological]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, growing, clinical, 'relevance,', in, particular, in, oncology])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, 'multi-protease', digestion, 'approach,', we, identified, a, novel, ubiquitination, site, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, detailed, 'B-Raf', 'phospho-map'])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', we, identify, two, evolutionary]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([phosphorylation, clusters, around, 'T401', and, 'S419', in, the, 'B-Raf', hinge, region])].
[sujeto(['SILAC', labelling, and, 'genetic/biochemical', 'follow-up', revealed, that, these, clusters, are]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([in, the, contexts, of, oncogenic, 'Ras,', sorafenib, induced, 'Raf', dimerization, and, in, the, background, of, the, 'V600E', mutation])].
[sujeto(['Substitution', of, the, 'Ser/Thr-residues', of, this, cluster, by, alanine, residues]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, transforming, potential, of, 'B-Raf,', indicating, that, these, phosphorylation, sites, suppress, its, signaling, output])].
[sujeto(['Mitochondrial', alterations]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, oncogenes, are, known, to, be, crucial, for, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['Ras', oncogene]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, proliferative, signals, through, a, 'Raf-1/MEK/ERK', kinase, 'cascade,', whose, components, have, been, found, to, be, also, associated, with, mitochondria])].
[sujeto(['Using', cellular, and, in, vivo, mouse, 'models,', we, demonstrated, that, 'CypD', protein, upregulation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, oncogenic, 'Ras', through, the, 'Raf-1/MEK/ERK', pathway, has, a, deterministic, role, in, tumor, progression])].
[sujeto(['In', 'fact,']), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['CypD', gene, expression, clearly, affected, 'RasV12-induced', 'transformation,', as, showed, by, in, vitro, data, on, murine, 'NIH3T3', and, human, 'MCF10A', mammary, epithelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', studies, in, xenograft, and, 'K-Ras', lung, cancer, mouse, models, demonstrated, that, genetic, deletion, or, pharmacological, suppression, of, 'CypD', efficiently]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['Ras-dependent', tumor, formation])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Erbb2-mediated', breast, tumorigenesis, was, similarly]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, targeting, 'CypD'])].
[sujeto(['From', a, mechanistic, point, of, 'view,', 'CypD', expression, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, reduced, induction, of, 'p21(WAF1/CIP1)', and, p53, 'functions,', unraveling, an, antagonistic, function, of, 'CypD', on, 'p21-p53-mediated', growth, suppression])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', a, physical, association, between, p53, and, 'CypD', was, detected, in, mitochondria, of, 'MCF10A', 'cells;', 'furthermore,', both, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, studies, proved, that, 'CypD', 'inhibitor-based', treatment, was, able, to, efficiently, impair, this, 'interaction,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, a, tumor, formation, reduction])].
[sujeto(['All', 'together,', these, findings, indicate, that, the, countering, effect, of, 'CypD', on, the, 'p53-p21', pathway]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, 'oncogene-dependent', transformation])].
[sujeto(['A-Raf', belongs, to, the, family, of, oncogenic, 'Raf', kinases, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, mitogenic, signaling, by, activating, the, 'MEK-ERK', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Low', kinase, activity, of, 'A-Raf', toward, 'MEK']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'A-Raf', might, have, alternative, functions])].
[sujeto(['Independent', of, kinase, 'activity,', 'A-Raf']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'MST2', thereby, efficiently, inhibiting, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, the, interaction, of, 'A-Raf', with, the, 'MST2', pathway, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, subcellular, compartmentalization])].

[sujeto(['(', 'ABSTRACT', 'TRUNCATED', 'AT', 250, 'WORDS)', 'X-linked', progressive, cone, dystrophy, '(', 'COD1)']), verbo([causes]), complemento([progressive, deterioration, of, visual, 'acuity,', deepening, of, central, 'scotomas,', macular, 'changes,', and, 'bull\'s-eye', lesions])].

[sujeto(['The', carcinogenesis, of, 'non-small', cell, lung, carcinoma]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, associate, with, activating, and, resistant, mutations, in, the, tyrosine, kinase, domain, of, specific, oncogenes])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, epithelial, growth, factor, receptor, mutations, were, the, most, prevalent, '(', 44.2, '%', ')', ',', followed, by, 'KRAS', '(', 18.8, '%', ')', ',', 'ALK', '(', 7.8, '%', ')', ',', and, 'BRAF', '(', 5.8, '%', ')', mutations])].

[sujeto(['Thymic', epithelial, tumors, '(', 'TETs)', are, rare, neoplasms, with, different, prognosis, lacking, consistent, molecular, alterations, possibly]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, targeted, therapy])].
[sujeto(['High', 'PD-L1', expression, was, statistically]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'WHO', classification, stage, type, 'C', '(', 'p&lt;0'])].

[sujeto(['B-Raf', kinase, is, the, key, point, in, a, main, branch, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, pathways, and, some, of, its, 'mutations,', such, as, the, 'V600E', 'mutation,']), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, persistent, activation, of, 'ERK', signaling, and, the, trigger, of, severe, 'diseases,', including, melanoma, and, other, somatic, cancers])].

[sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, 'BRAF', gene]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, several, human, cancers])].

[sujeto(['We', quantitatively, summarized, the, evidence, and, compared, immune, and]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies, in, terms, of, both, efficacy, and, toxicity])].

[sujeto(['Combined', 'BRAF', and, 'MEK', inhibitors, were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, longer, 'PFS', as, compared, to, 'anti-CTLA4', '(', 'HR:', 0.22, ;, 95, '%', confidence, interval, '[', 'CI]:', 0.12, -, 0.41, ')', and, 'anti-PD1', antibodies, alone, '(', 'HR:', 0.38, ;, 'CI:', 0.2, -, 0.72, ')'])].

[sujeto(['Further', research, is, needed, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, quality, of, evidence])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'DAB', inhibited, 'LPS-induced', barrier, 'disruption,', expression, of, cell, adhesion, molecules, '(', 'CAMs),', and, 'adhesion/transendothelial', migration, of, neutrophils, to, human, endothelial, cells])].

[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'DAB', possesses, 'anti-inflammatory', functions, by, inhibiting, 'hyperpermeability,', expression, of, 'CAMs,', and, adhesion, and, migration, of, 'leukocytes,', thereby, endorsing, its, usefulness, as, a, therapy, for, vascular, inflammatory, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Studies', focused, on, the, killing, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['B-RAF', melanoma, cells, by, the, histone, deacetylase, '(', 'HDAC)', inhibitor, 'AR42'])].
[sujeto(['AR42', and, the, 'multi-kinase', inhibitor, pazopanib]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([to, 'activate:', an, 'eIF2α-Beclin1', pathway, causing, autophagosome, 'formation;', an, 'eIF2α-DR4/DR5/CD95', 'pathway;', and, an, 'eIF2α-dependent', reduction, in, the, expression, of, 'c-FLIP-s,', 'MCL-1', and, 'BCL-XL'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'vivo,', a, 3, -, day, exposure, of, 'dabrafenib/trametinib', resistant, melanoma, cells, to, the, 'AR42', pazopanib, combination, reduced, tumor, growth, and]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([survival, from, '~25', to, '~40', days])].

[sujeto(['Although', malignant, melanoma, of, oral, mucosa, shares, some, clinical, features, with, its, cutaneous, 'counterpart,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, a, worst, 'prognosis;', its, etiopathogenesis, are, still, only, partially, unraveled, as, there, is, no, influence, of, 'UV', radiation])].
[sujeto(['It', is, known, that, the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, pathway]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([cellular, responses, to, growth, signals, and, its, activation, is, an, important, phenomenon, in, melanoma])].
[sujeto(['Point', mutations, of, 'NRAS', '(', codons, 12, ',', 13, ',', and, 61, ')', and, 'BRAF', '(', codon, 600, ')', were, screened, by, pyrosequencing, 'method,', and, its, results, were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([to, the, protein, expression, of, 'RAS', and, 'BRAF', performed, by, immunohistochemistry])].
[sujeto(['Historically,', metastatic, melanoma]), verbo([has]), complemento([had, extremely, poor, survival, outcomes])].
[sujeto(['The', 'outlook,', 'however,', is, rapidly, changing, as, new, molecularly]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies, have, vastly, improved, patient, outcomes])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', toxicities, were, generally]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, manageable, with, dose, modification, or, interruption])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', new, trials, are, beginning, to, investigate, the, addition, of, a, third]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([agent, or, immunotherapy, in, order, to, increase, the, durability, of, treatment, response])].
[sujeto(['Radiotherapy', can, also]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([immune, 'responses,', inducing, neoantigens, 'formation,', tumor, antigen, 'presentation,', and, cytokines, release])].
