[sujeto(['If', hadrontherapy, biological, properties, seem, able, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento(['hypoxia-induced', radioresistance, and, increase, biological, 'efficacy,', ballistic, advantages, over, photon, radiations, might, also, improve, radiotherapy, outcomes, on, usually, poor, prognosis, locations])].
[sujeto(['RAF1', also]), verbo([has]), complemento([essential, functions, in, the, control, of, tumorigenesis, and, migration, that, are, mediated, through, its, interaction, with, the, kinase, 'ROKα,', an, effector, of, the, 'GTPase', 'RHO', and, regulator, of, cytoskeletal, rearrangements])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, phosphorylated, form, of, 'RAF1', that, interacted, with, and, inhibited, 'ROKα', was, generated, during, the, interaction, of, 'RAF1', with, the, 'ERK', module])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', by, connecting, 'ERK', activation, with, the, regulation, of, 'ROKα', and, cytoskeletal, rearrangements, by, 'RAF1,', this, mechanism]), verbo([has]), complemento([the, potential, to, precisely, coordinate, the, proper, timing, of, proliferation, with, changes, in, cell, 'shape,', 'adhesion,', or, motility])].
[sujeto(['Consequently,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, an, important, therapeutic, target, in, various, malignancies])].
[sujeto(['However,', expression, of, oncogenic, 'K-Ras(G12V),', either, by, itself, or, in, combination, with, 'RAF', dimer]), verbo([promoting]), complemento(['inhibitors,', induces, the, incorporation, of, 'BRAF(WT)', into, 'large,', active, 'complexes,', whereas, pharmacological, inhibition, of, 'BRAF(V)(600E)', has, the, opposite, effect])].
[sujeto(['Chromosomal', rearrangements]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, gene, 'ROS1', define, a, distinct, molecular, subset, of, 'NSCLCs', with, sensitivity, to, 'ROS1', inhibitors])].

[sujeto(['Among', 62, patients, with, 'ROS1-rearranged', 'NSCLC\240\evaluated', at, our, 'institution,', none, harbored, 'concurrent\240\ALK', fusions, '(', 0, '%', ')', or, 'EGFR']), verbo([activating]), complemento([mutations, '(', 0, '%', ')'])].

[sujeto(['Such']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies, are, 'not,', 'however,', free, of, side, 'effects,', and, these, side, effects, are, clearly, distinct, from, those, induced, by, classical, cytotoxic, chemotherapies])].
[sujeto(['This', is, likely, so, because]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies, are, designed, to, interfere, with, specific, oncogenic, signaling, pathways, rather, than, to, inhibit, cell, proliferation, in, general])].
[sujeto(['In', 'fact,', interference, with, specific, signaling, pathways, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, effects, that, mimic, those, associated, with, genetic, disorders, due, to, alterations, in, the, corresponding, signaling, pathways])].

[sujeto(['Androgen', receptor, '(', 'AR)-mediated', signaling, is, necessary, for, prostate, cancer, cell, proliferation, and, an, important]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, therapeutic, drug, development])].
[sujeto(['Canonically,', 'AR', signals, through, a, genomic, or, transcriptional, 'pathway,']), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, translocation, of, 'androgen-bound', 'AR', to, the, 'nucleus,', its, binding, to, cognate, androgen, response, elements, on, 'promoter,', with, ensuing, modulation, of, target, gene, 'expression,', leading, to, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['This', proliferation, response, known, as, the, 'non-genomic', 'AR', signaling, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, cytoplasmic, 'AR,', which, facilitates, the, activation, of, 'kinase-signaling', 'cascades,', including, the, 'Ras-Raf-1,', 'phosphatidyl-inositol', 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)/Akt', and, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC),', which, in, turn, converge, on, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', 'activation,', leading, to, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Further,', since]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['ERK', may, also, phosphorylate, 'AR', and, its, 'coactivators,', the, 'non-genomic', 'AR', signaling, may, enhance, 'AR', genomic, activity])].
[sujeto(['Non-genomic', 'AR', signaling, may, occur, in, an, 'ERK-independent', 'manner,', via, activation, of, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', 'pathway,', or, modulation, of, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', concentration, through, plasma, membrane, 'G', 'protein-coupled', receptors, '(', 'GPCRs)'])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, therapeutic, strategies, aimed, at, preventing, 'AR', nuclear, translocation, and, genomic, 'AR', signaling, alone, may, not, completely, abrogate, 'AR', signaling])].
[sujeto(['YB-1,']), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento(['YB-1', '(', 'p-YB-1),', and, 'ERK2', protein, expressions, in, 165, clinical, specimens, of, prostate, cancer, were, investigated, by, immunohistochemistry])].
[sujeto(['YB-1,', 'p-YB-1,', and, 'ERK2']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([expressions, were, compared, with, clinicopathologic, characteristics, and, patient, prognoses])].

[sujeto(['Excessive', alcohol, consumption, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, most, cases, of, chronic, 'pancreatitis,', a, progressive, necrotizing, inflammatory, disease, that, can, result, in, pancreatic, insufficiency, due, to, acinar, atrophy, and, fibrosis, and, an, increased, risk, of, pancreatic, cancer])].

[sujeto(['To', analyze, 14, -, 3, -, 3, function, and]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([its, 'activity,', we, conducted, a, chemical, screen, and, identified, 4, -, '[', '(', 2, 'Z)-2-[4-formyl-6-methyl-5-oxo-3-(phosphonatooxymethyl)pyridin-2-ylidene]hydrazinyl]benzoate', as, a, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'inhibitor,', which, we, termed, 'FOBISIN', '(', 'FOurteen-three-three', 'BInding', 'Small', molecule, 'INhibitor)', 101])].

[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, by, which, 'Raf', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([are, still, incompletely, understood])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, mutation, of, 'Lys375', to, 'Met', diminishes, phosphorylation, of, 'Ser338', on, both, wild, type, 'Raf-1', in, cells, treated, with, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)', or, 12, -, 'O-tetradecanoylphorbol-13-acetate', '(', 'TPA)', and, a, constitutively, active, mutant, in, which, 'Tyr340/Tyr341', are, replaced, by, 2, aspartic, 'acids,', a, conserved, substitution, present, in, natural, 'B-Raf'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Ser338', phosphorylation, in, these, 'Raf', mutants, is, not, engendered, by, a, 'mutation-induced', conformational, 'change,', inasmuch, as, mutation, of, another, site, '(', 'Ser471', to, 'Ala)', in, the, activation, segment, also, abolishes, 'Ser338', 'phosphorylation,', whereas, both, the, 'kinase-dead', mutants, of, 'Raf-1', are, phosphorylated, well, by, active, 'Pak1'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, data, demonstrate, that, 'EGF-stimulated', phosphorylation, of, 'Ser338', is]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'Sorafenib,', a, 'Raf', kinase, 'inhibitor,', but, not, by, the, 'MEK', inhibitor, 'U0126'])].

[sujeto(['Altogether,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Ser338', on, 'Raf-1', is, autophosphorylated, in, response, to, mitogens])].
[sujeto(['Raf-1', is, an, important, effector, of, 'Ras']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([signaling, and, is, a, critical, regulator, of, the, 'ERK/MAPK', pathway])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, support, a, model, where, under, conditions, of, weak, stimulation, through, the, 'TCR,', in, addition, to]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Ras,', 'Golgi', 'apparatus-localized', 'Lck', is, needed, for, the, full, activation, of, 'Raf-1'])].
[sujeto(['Interferon', alpha, '(', 'IFNalpha)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([an, 'EGF-Ras--&gt;Raf-1--&gt;Erk', dependent, survival, pathway, counteracting, apoptosis, induced, by, the, cytokine])].
[sujeto(['In', this, paper, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([evaluated, the, effects, of, the, combination, between, 'farnesyl-transferase', inhibitor, '(', 'FTI)', 'R115777', and, 'IFNalpha', on, the, growth, inhibition, and, apoptosis, of, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', these, experimental, 'conditions,', 'IFNalpha', and, 'R115777', completely, antagonized, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([activity, of, both, 'Ras', and, 'Erk-1/2', induced, by, 'IFNalpha', and, strongly, reduced, 'Akt', activity])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', treatment, with, 'R115777', in, combination, with, 'IFNalpha', regimen]), verbo([induced]), complemento([tumor, growth, delay, on, established, 'KB', cell, xenografts, in, nude, 'mice,', while, the, single, agents, were, almost, inactive])].
[sujeto(['R115777', was, again, able, to, antagonize, the, 'Ras-dependent', survival, pathway]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'IFNalpha', also, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Raf-1,', one, of, the, downstream]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, 'Ras,', has, been, reported, to, activate, 'bcl-2', through, displacement, 'and/or', phosphorylation, of, 'Bad'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, 'IFNalpha', induced, mitochondrial, localization, of, 'Raf-1', that, was, antagonized, by, 'R115777'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'IFNalpha']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Raf-1/bcl-2', 'immuno-conjugate', formation, and, intracellular, 'co-localization', and, enhanced, phosphorylation, of, 'Bad', at, 'Ser', 112, and, again, 'R115777', counteracted, all, these, effects])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, molecular, signaling, pathway, induced, by, the, 'C-type', lectin, 'DC-SIGN', that, modulates, 'TLR', signaling, at, the, level, of, the, transcription, factor, 'NF-kappaB'])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, pathogens]), verbo([trigger]), complemento(['DC-SIGN', on, human, 'DCs', to, activate, the, serine, and, threonine, kinase, 'Raf-1,', which, subsequently, leads, to, acetylation, of, the, 'NF-kappaB', subunit, 'p65,', but, only, after, 'TLR-induced', activation, of, 'NF-kappaB'])].
[sujeto(['Acetylation', of, p65, both, prolonged, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['IL10', transcription, to, enhance, 'anti-inflammatory', cytokine, responses])].
[sujeto(['leprae,', 'Candida', 'albicans,', measles, 'virus,', and, human, immunodeficiency, 'virus-1']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, 'DC-SIGN', to, activate, the, 'Raf-1-acetylation-dependent', signaling, pathway, to, modulate, signaling, by, different, 'TLRs'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', this, pathway, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, regulation, of, adaptive, immunity, by, 'DCs', to, 'bacterial,', 'fungal,', and, viral, pathogens])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'Raf-1', by, 'Ras']), verbo([requires]), complemento([recruitment, to, the, membrane, as, well, as, additional, 'phosphorylations,', including, phosphorylation, at, serine, 338, '(', 'Ser-338)', and, tyrosine, 341, '(', 'Tyr-341)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we, show, that, 'Tyr-341']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, recruitment, of, 'Raf-1', to, specialized, membrane, domains, called, '"', 'rafts,"', which, are, required, for, 'Raf-1', to, be, phosphorylated, on, 'Ser-338'])].
[sujeto(['Raf-1', is, also, thought, to, be]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, small, 'G', protein, 'Rap1', upon, 'GTP', loading, of, 'Rap1'])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, this, is, because, 'Raf-1', is, not]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([on, 'Tyr-341', upon, recruitment, to, 'Rap1'])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'Raf-1,', 'B-Raf', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'Rap1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, this, is, because, 'B-Raf', activation, is, independent, of, tyrosine, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', mutants, that, render, 'B-Raf', dependent, on, tyrosine, phosphorylation, are, no, longer]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'Rap1'])].
[sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, are, a, family, of]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([dimeric, molecules, that, interact, with, a, broad, range, of, target, 'proteins,', most, of, which, contain, 'phosphoserine/threonine'])].
[sujeto(['The', amphipathic, groove, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, is, the, main, structural, feature]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, mediating, its, associations])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, another, domain, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ',', the, 'C-terminal', 'loop,', to, determine, what, role, it, plays, in, ligand, interaction])].
[sujeto(['A', truncated, form, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, zeta, lacking, this, 'C-terminal', loop, was, generated, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, bind, with, higher, affinity, than, the, 'wild-type', 14, -, 3, -, 3, zeta, protein, to, the, ligands, 'Raf-1', and, 'Bad'])].

[sujeto(['This', may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanism, by, which, inappropriate, associations, with, 14, -, 3, -, 3, are, prevented])].
[sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, belong, to, a, family, of]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['molecules,', which, play, a, regulatory, role, and, participate, in, signal, transduction, and, checkpoint, control, pathways])].
[sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['phosphoserine-phosphorylated', 'ligands,', such, as, the, 'Raf-1', kinase, and, 'Bad,', through, recognition, of, the, phosphorylated, consensus, 'motif,', 'RSXpSXP', '(', where, pS, is, 'phosphoserine)'])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', a, 'phosphorylation-independent', interaction]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, occur, between, 14, -, 3, -, 3, and, a, small, number, of, 'proteins,', for, example, the, 43, kDa, inositol, polyphosphate, 5, -, 'phosphatase,', glycoprotein, 'Ib,', 'p75NTR-associated', 'cell-death', executor, '(', 'NADE)', and, the, bacterial, 'ADP-ribosyltransferase', toxin, exoenzyme, 'S', '(', 'ExoS)'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, that, specific, residues, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, are, required, for, activation, of, the, bacterial, toxin, 'ExoS'])].
[sujeto(['An', unphosphorylated, peptide, derived, from, a, phage, display, 'library,', known, as, the, 'R18', 'peptide,', and, a, synthetic, peptide, derived, from, 'ExoS']), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, interaction, between, 'ExoS', and, 14, -, 3, -, 3])].

[sujeto(['Loss', of, the, 14, -, 3, -, 3, -]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, on, 'ExoS', results, in, an, 'ExoS', molecule, that, is, unable, to, efficiently, inactivate, 'Ras', and, shows, a, reduced, capacity, to, change, the, morphology, of, infected, 'cells,', together, with, reduced, killing, activity])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, of, 'TNF-alpha']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([activation, of, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)/M1AP', kinase, has, not, been, established, clearly])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'TNF-alpha', and, 'cell-permeable', ceramide]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, increase, the, kinase, activity, of, kinase, suppressor, of, 'Ras', '(', 'KSR)'])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, the, role, of, 'KSR', in, 'TNF-alpha-induced', 'ERK1/ERK2', 'activation,', we, studied, young, adult, mouse, colon, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([a, 'dominant-negative,', 'kinase-inactive', '(', 'ki)', 'KSR'])].

[sujeto(['Our', data, also, show, by, sequential, in, vitro, kinase, assays, that, 'TNF-alpha']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['KSR', phosphorylation, of, 'Raf-1', on, 'threonine,', enhancing, 'Raf-1', kinase, activity, toward, 'MAP', kinase, kinase])].

[sujeto(['cAMP-dependent', protein, kinase, '(', 'PKA)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, interfere, with, 'T-cell', activation, by, inhibiting, interleukin, '(', 'IL-2)', receptor, 'alpha-chain', '(', 'CD25)', expression, and, 'IL-2', production])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Ras/MAP', kinase, pathway]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, be, necessary, for, induction, of, the, 'IL-2', production])].

[sujeto(['Both', 'v-Src', and, phorbol, esters, were, potent, activators, of, 'CR3,']), verbo([requiring]), complemento([the, serine, 338, /, 339, '(', 'p21-activated', protein, 'kinase,', 'Pak)', and, tyrosine, 340, /, 341, '(', 'Src)', phosphorylation, sites, for, full, stimulation, of, 'CR3'])].

[sujeto(['When', 'co-expressed', in, 'COS-7', 'cells,', 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([associated]), complemento([strongly, with, 'full-length', 'Raf-1,', weakly, with, 'wild-type', 'CR3', and, not, at, all, with, the, 'A621', and, 'D621', 'CR3', mutants])].
[sujeto(['The', role, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, catalytic, domain, of, 'Raf-1', was, investigated, further, by, performing, 'peptide-competition', studies, with, 'wild-type', 'CR3,', 'wild-type', 'CR3', and, 'v-Src', or, constitutively, active, 'CR3', '(', 'CR3[YY340/341DD])'])].

[sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, play, a, regulatory, role, and]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, both, signal, transduction, and, checkpoint, control, pathways])].
[sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins]), verbo([bind]), complemento([phosphoserine, 'ligands,', such, as, 'Raf-1', kinase, and, 'Bad,', by, recognizing, the, phosphorylated, consensus, 'motif,', 'Arg-Ser-Xaa-pSer-Xaa-Pro', '(', where, '\'', 'Xaa\'', represents, '\'', any, 'residue\',', and, '\'', 'pSer\'', is, '\'', 'phosphoserine\')'])].
[sujeto(['However,', 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, must]), verbo([bind]), complemento([unphosphorylated, 'ligands,', such, as, glycoprotein, 'Ibalpha', and, 'Pseudomonas', aeruginosa, exoenzyme, 'S', '(', 'ExoS),', since, it, has, been, suggested, that, specific, residues, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, are, required, for, activation, of, 'ExoS'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', an, unphosphorylated, peptide, derived, from, a, phage, display, library]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, binding, of, both, 'ExoS', and, 'Raf-1', to, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ',', and, bound, within, the, same, conserved, amphipathic, groove, on, the, surface, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, as, the, 'Raf-derived', phosphopeptide, '(', 'pS-Raf-259)'])].

[sujeto(['Loss', of, the, 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, on, 'ExoS', results, in, an, 'ExoS', molecule, that, is, unable, to, efficiently, inactivate, 'Ras,', and, displays, reduced, killing, activity])].
[sujeto(['Full', activation, of, 'Raf-1']), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, interaction, of, its, 'CRD', with, 'Ras'])].

[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'COS-7', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['Ha-Ras(Val-12)', and, 'Raf-1', with, 'TPA', enhances, the, 'Ha-Ras(Val-12)-dependent', 'Raf-1', kinase, activity])].

[sujeto(['Although', both, positive, and, negative, regulatory, functions]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, ascribed, for, 14, -, 3, -, 3, interactions, with, 'Raf-1,', the, mechanisms, by, which, 14, -, 3, -, 3, binding, modulates, 'Raf', activity, have, not, been, fully, established])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, mutational, disruption, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, binding, to, the, 'B-Raf', catalytic, domain, inhibits, 'B-Raf', biological, activity])].

[sujeto(['Persistent', hepatitis, 'C', virus, '(', 'HCV)', infection, is, a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, chronic, liver, dysfunction, in, humans, and, is, epidemiologically, closely, associated, with, the, development, of, human, hepatocellular, carcinoma])].
[sujeto(['Among', 'HCV', 'components,', core, protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, implicated, in, cell, growth, regulation, both, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', although, mechanisms, explaining, those, effects, are, still, unclear])].

[sujeto(['Expression', of, polySia, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, metastatic, dissemination, and, progression, of, various, malignant, diseases])].

[sujeto(['Several', 'brain-gut', peptides]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, have, a, close, relationship, with, the, central, dopaminergic, 'system;', one, such, 'brain-gut', peptide, is, 'nesfatin-1'])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, ghrelin, exerted, neuroprotective, effects, on, nigral, dopaminergic, 'neurons,', which, implied, a, role, for, ghrelin, in, 'Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'PD)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, aim, to, clarify, whether, 'nesfatin-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([similar, effects, on, dopaminergic, neurons, both, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])].

[sujeto(['These', results, imply, that, 'nesfatin-1', might]), verbo([have]), complemento([therapeutic, potential, for, 'PD'])].
[sujeto(['Nine']), verbo([target]), complemento([compounds, were, selected, by, the, 'National', 'Cancer', 'Institute', '(', 'NCI,', 'Bethesda,', 'Maryland,', 'USA)', for, 'in\240\vitro', antiproliferative, screening, against, a, panel, of, 58, cancer, cell, lines, of, nine, cancer, types])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, most, potent, compounds, 1, 'd-g', were, tested, against, 'C-RAF', kinase, as, a, potential, molecular]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, this, series, of, compounds])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([modes, of, compounds, '1e', and, 1, g, were, studied, by, docking, 'studies,', which, highlighted, the, importance, of, the, urea, linker, compared, with, the, amide, linker])].
[sujeto(['Data', demonstrated, that, rhodomyrtone, could]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, focal, adhesion, kinase, '(', 'FAK)', and, phosphorylation, of, protein, 'kinase\240\B\240\(AKT),', 'c-Raf,', extracellular, 'signal-regulated', 'kinase\240\1/2', '(', 'ERK1/2)', and, 'p38\240\MAPK', involved, in, the, downregulation, the, enzyme, activities, and, protein, expression, of, matrix, 'metalloproteinase-2\240\(MMP-2)', and, 'MMP-9'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, rhodomyrtone, increased, the, expression, of, 'TIMP-1', and, 'TIMP-2,', which, are, inhibitors, of, 'MMP-9', and, 'MMP-2,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Rhodomyrtone', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'NF-κB', and, phosphorylation, of, 'NF-κB', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, rhodomyrtone, inhibited, 'A431', cell, metastasis, by, reducing, 'MMP-2/9', activities, and, expression, through, inhibiting, 'ERK1/2,', p38, and, 'FAK/Akt', signaling, pathways, via, 'NF-κB', activities])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([suggested, that, rhodomyrtone, may, be, a, novel, antimetastasis, agent, for, treatment, of, skin, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Hypophosphatemia']), verbo([causes]), complemento([rickets, by, impairing, hypertrophic, chondrocyte, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Phosphate', induction, of, 'MEK1/2-ERK1/2', phosphorylation, in, hypertrophic, chondrocytes, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'phosphate-mediated', apoptosis, and, growth, plate, maturation])].
[sujeto(['MEK1/2', can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, numerous, molecules, including, 'Raf', isoforms])].
[sujeto(['A-', and, 'B-Raf', ablation, in, chondrocytes, does, not, alter, skeletal, 'development,', whereas, ablation, of, 'C-Raf']), verbo([decreases]), complemento([hypertrophic, chondrocyte, apoptosis, and, impairs, vascularization, of, the, growth, plate])].
[sujeto(['However,', ablation, of, 'C-Raf', does, not, impair, 'phosphate-induced', 'ERK1/2', phosphorylation, in, 'vitro,', but]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, rickets, by, decreasing, 'VEGF', protein, stability])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, whether, 'Raf', isoforms, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'phosphate-induced', hypertrophic, chondrocyte, 'apoptosis,', mice, lacking, all, three, 'Raf', isoforms, in, chondrocytes, were, generated])].
[sujeto(['Raf', deletion]), verbo([caused]), complemento([neonatal, death, and, a, significant, expansion, of, the, hypertrophic, chondrocyte, layer, of, the, growth, 'plate,', accompanied, by, decreased, cleaved, 'caspase-9'])].
[sujeto(['This', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, decreased, 'phospho-ERK1/2', immunoreactivity, in, the, hypertrophic, chondrocyte, layer, and, impaired, vascular, invasion])].
[sujeto(['These', data, further, demonstrated, that, 'Raf', kinases, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'phosphate-induced', 'ERK1/2', phosphorylation, in, cultured, hypertrophic, chondrocytes, and, perform, 'essential,', but, partially, redundant, roles, in, growth, plate, maturation])].
[sujeto(['Two', small, 'G', 'proteins,', 'Ras', and, 'Rap1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, proposed, to, mediate, this, activation])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'HEK293', cells, as, a, model, 'system,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, both, 'Ras', and, 'Rap1', are, required, for, cAMP, signaling, to, 'ERKs'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, this, is, due, to, sustained]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'B-Raf', to, 'Rap1'])].
[sujeto(['One', of, the]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, 'PKA', is, 'Rap1', 'itself,', directly, phosphorylating, 'Rap1a', on, serine, 180, and, 'Rap1b', on, serine, 179])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, these, phosphorylations, create, potential]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, the, adaptor, protein, 14, -, 3, -, 3, that, links, 'Rap1', to, the, scaffold, protein, 'KSR'])].

[sujeto(['Because', 'KSR', and, 'B-Raf', exist, as, heterodimers, within, the, 'cell,', this]), verbo([binding]), complemento([also, brings, 'B-Raf', to, 'Rap1,', allowing, 'Rap1', to, couple, to, 'ERKs', through, 'B-Raf', binding, to, 'Rap1', independently, of, its, 'Ras-binding', domain])].
[sujeto(['X-linked', juvenile, retinoschisis, '(', 'XLRS)', is, a, hereditary, retinal, dystrophy, in, young, 'males,']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, 'RS1', gene])].
[sujeto(['Earlier', gene, expression, studies, in, 'retinoschisin-deficient', '(', 'Rs1h(-/Y)', ')', mice]), verbo([provided]), complemento([a, first, indication, of, pathological, 'up-regulation', of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinase, signalling, in, disease, pathogenesis])].

[sujeto(['Whether', 'non-nutrient', secretagogues]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([mitochondria, as, part, of, the, molecular, mechanism, to, promote, insulin, secretion, is, not, known])].
[sujeto(['A', range, of, inhibitors, of, novel, 'PKC', isoforms]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([phorbol, 'ester-induced', respiration])].

[sujeto(['We', concluded, that, 'ISO']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['HDAC6', expression, via, a, 'PKA/Epac/ERK-dependent', pathway, that, stimulates, the, migration, of, lung, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, stress, signals, can, stimulate, the, migration, of, cancer, cells, by, inducing, 'HDAC6', expression, in, lung, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Two', small, 'G', 'proteins,', 'Ras', and, 'Rap1,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, proposed, to, mediate, this, 'activation,', with, either, 'Ras', or, 'Rap1', acting, in, distinct, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'Hek293', 'cells,', we, show, that, both, 'Ras', and, 'Rap1', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, cAMP, signaling, to, 'ERKs'])].

[sujeto(['Ras', activation]), verbo([required]), complemento([the, 'Ras/Rap', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'GEF)', 'PDZ-GEF1'])].
[sujeto(['Rap1', activation, was, dependent, on, 'PKA', and]), verbo([required]), complemento(['Src', family, kinases, and, the, 'Rap1', exchanger, 'C3G'])].
[sujeto(['This', is, the, first]), verbo([report]), complemento([of, a, mechanism, for, the, cooperative, actions, of, 'Ras', and, 'Rap1', in, cAMP, activation, of, 'ERKs'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, the, induction, of, 'c-FOS', by, cAMP]), verbo([required]), complemento([both, the, early, and, sustained, phases, of, 'ERK', 'activation,', requiring, 'Ras', and, 'Rap1,', as, well, as, for, each, of, the, 'Raf', 'isoforms,', 'B-Raf', and, 'C-Raf'])].
[sujeto(['The', guanine, 'nucleotide-binding', protein, 'Ras', occurs, in, solution, in, two, different, 'states,', state, 1, and, state, 2, ',', when, the, 'GTP', analogue, 'GppNHp', is]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, active, center, as, detected, by, '(', 31, ')', 'P', 'NMR', spectroscopy])].
[sujeto(['This', excludes, a]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([specific, effect, of, the, 'NH', group, of, 'GppNHp', on, the, equilibrium])].
[sujeto(['The', assignment, of, the, phosphorus, resonance, lines, of, the]), verbo([bound]), complemento([analogues, has, been, done, by, 'two-dimensional', '(', 31, ')', 'P-(31)P', 'NOESY', experiments, which, lead, to, a, correction, of, the, already, reported, assignments, of, bound, 'GppNHp'])].
[sujeto(['GppCH(2)p', to, serine]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, shift, of, the, conformational, equilibrium, toward, state, 1])].
[sujeto(['Interaction', of, the, 'Ras']), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, '(', 'RBD)', of, 'Raf', kinase, or, 'RalGDS', with, 'Ras(wt)', or, 'Ras(T35S)', shifts, the, equilibrium, completely, to, state, 2])].
[sujeto(['The', '(', 31, ')', 'P', 'NMR', experiments]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that,', besides, the, type, of, the, side, chain, of, residue, 35, ',', a, main, contribution, to, the, conformational, equilibrium, in, 'Ras', complexes, with, 'GTP', and, 'GTP', analogues, is, the, effective, acidity, of, the, 'gamma-phosphate', group, of, the, bound, nucleotide])].
[sujeto(['A', reaction, scheme, for, the, 'Ras-effector', interaction, is, presented, which, includes, the, existence, of, two, conformations, of, the, effector, loop, and, a, weak]), verbo([binding]), complemento([state])].
[sujeto(['The', rate, of, hydrolysis, of, 'GTPgammaNH(2)']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'Ras', protein, lay, between, the, rates, found, for, 'Ras-bound', 'GTPgammaS', and, 'GppNHp,', while, 'Ras-catalysed', hydrolysis, of, 'GTPgammaF', was, almost, as, fast, as, for, 'GTP'])].
[sujeto(['The', protooncogenes, 'Ras', and, 'Raf', play, important, roles, in, signal, transduction, pathways]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinases])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', of, 'Ras', that]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([the, protein, in, its, active, state, are, frequently, implicated, in, tumor, formation])].
[sujeto(['We', used, 'Ras', and, 'Raf', proteins, in, the, yeast, 'two-hybrid', system, to, search, for, natural, or]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([substances, capable, of, modulating, 'Ras/Raf', interaction, by, specifically, binding, to, one, of, the, interacting, partners])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, cycloalkylidene, carboxylic, acids, enhanced, 'Ras/Raf', interaction, by, acting, on, the, 'cysteine-rich', domain, of, 'Raf'])].
[sujeto(['Several', analogues, of, the, active, substance, 2, -, cyclohexylidene, propanoic, acid, were]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([and, the, importance, of, the, semicyclic, double, bond, in, the, stabilization, of, 'Ras/Raf', interaction, was, demonstrated])].
[sujeto(['Variation', of, the, size, and, the, substituents, of, the, cyclic, system, as, well, as, the, length, of, the, carboxylic, acid, resulted, in]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['Ras/Raf', interaction])].
[sujeto(['Growth', factor, stimulation, translocates, 'SPRED1', to, the, plasma, 'membrane,']), verbo([triggering]), complemento([its, inhibitory, activity])].
[sujeto(['However,', it, remains, unclear, whether, 'SPRED1', there]), verbo([acts]), complemento([at, the, level, of, 'Ras', or, 'Raf'])].
[sujeto(['The', physiological, significance, of, these, novel, interactions, is, supported, by, two, 'Legius', 'syndrome-associated', mutations, that, show, diminished]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, both, 'Gal-1', and, 'B-Raf'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', a, combinatorial, expression, of, 'SPRED1', and, 'Gal-1', potentially]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([specific, patterns, of, 'K-ras-', and, 'H-ras-dependent', signaling, output])].
[sujeto(['More', 'broadly,', our, results, open, up, the, possibility, that, related, 'SPRED', and, 'Sprouty', proteins]), verbo([act]), complemento([in, a, similar, 'Ras', and, 'Raf', 'isoform-specific', manner])].
[sujeto(['In', an, attempt, to, identify, new, small, molecules]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'Hsp90,', we, screened, a, small, library, of, tetranortriterpenes])].
[sujeto(['By', monitoring, the, 'ATPase', activity, and, the, citrate, synthase, thermal]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['aggregation,', compound, 1, '(', cedrelosin, 'A),', 3, '(', 7, 'α-limonylacetate),', and, 5, '(', cedrelosin, 'B),', containing, a, limonol, 'moiety,', were, found, to, be, the, most, effective, in, compromising, the, 'Hsp90α', chaperone, activity])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'findings,', the, three, compounds]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, depletion, of, 'c-Raf', and, pAkt, 'Hsp90', client, proteins, in, 'HeLa', and, 'MCF/7', cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Identification', of, novel, drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([and, affordable, therapeutic, agents, remains, a, high, priority, in, the, fight, against, chronic, hepatitis, 'C', virus, '(', 'HCV)', infection])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, cellular, proteins, prohibitin, 1, '(', 'PHB1)', and, 2, '(', 'PHB2)', are, 'pan-genotypic', 'HCV', entry, factors, functioning, at, a, 'post-binding', step])].
[sujeto(['While', predominantly]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'mitochondria,', 'PHBs', localize, to, the, plasma, membrane, of, hepatocytes, through, their, transmembrane, domains, and, interact, with, both, 'EGFR', and, 'CRaf'])].
[sujeto(['Targeting', 'PHB', by, rocaglamide, '(', 'Roc-A),', a, natural, product, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento(['PHB1', and, 2, ',', reduced, cell, surface, 'PHB1', and, 2, ',', disrupted, 'PHB-CRaf', 'interaction,', and, inhibited, 'HCV', entry, at, low, nanomolar, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, new, class, of, 'HCV', entry, inhibitors, that, target, the, 'PHB1/2-CRaf', pathway])].
[sujeto(['HSP90,', which, is, a, molecular, 'chaperone,', plays, a, vital, role, in, client, protein, processing, and]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([the, function, of, cells])].
[sujeto(['HSP90', is, usually, overexpressed, in, prostate, cancer, 'tissues,', which, makes, it, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, managing, prostate, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Geldanamycin', '(', 'GA),', which, was]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, the, first, natural, 'HSP90', 'inhibitor,', has, demonstrated, potent, 'anti-tumor', efficacy, in, 'large-scale', 'pre-clinical', 'studies,', but, its, application, in, the, clinic, is, not, permitted, due, to, its, liver, toxicity, and, unstable, physical, properties])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, new, 'GA', 'derivative,', 17, -, 'PAG', '(', 17, -, '(', 'propynylamino)-17-demethoxygeldanamycin),', which, demonstrates, highly, effective, 'anti-tumor', activity, against, 'androgen-independent', prostate, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Treating', cells, with, 17, -, 'PAG', 'dose-dependently']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['proliferation,', reduced, colony, formation, and, induced, apoptosis, of, 'DU-145/C4-2B', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 17, -, 'PAG']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, migration, and, invasion, of, 'DU-145/C4-2B', cells, by, regulating, epithelial, mesenchymal, transition, '(', 'EMT)'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([us, with, a, potential, target, for, treating, 'androgen-independent', prostate, cancer, in, a, safe, and, effective, manner])].
[sujeto(['Currently,', high, risk, 'NB', carries, a, poor, outcome, and, significant, treatment, related, toxicities, 'and,', thus]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, focus, for, new, therapeutics, research, in, pediatric, oncology])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, 'anti-proliferative', activity, of, cobimetinib, alone, or, in, combination, was, investigated, by, cell, viability, assays, and, its]), verbo([target]), complemento([modulatory, activity, was, evaluated, using, 'phospho-kinases', antibody, arrays, and, western, blot, analysis])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, the, effect, of, combination, with, 'cis-RA', on, differentiation, and, resulting]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cellular, 'cytotoxicity,', the, expression, of, glial, fibrillary, acidic, protein, '(', 'GFAP)', and, 'microtubule-associated', protein, 2, '(', 'MAP2)', expression, levels, were, examined, by, 'immuno-fluorescence'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, show, that, cobimetinib, alone]), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, 'concentration-dependent', loss, of, cell, viability, in, all, 'NB', cell, lines])].

[sujeto(['Combined', treatment, with, 'cis-RA,']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, differentiation, and, enhanced, sensitization, of, 'NB', cells, lines, to, cobimetinib])].

[sujeto(['LY3009120', is, a, 'pan-RAF', and, 'RAF', dimer, inhibitor, that]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([all, 'RAF', isoforms, and, occupies, both, protomers, in, 'RAF', dimers])].
[sujeto(['Biochemical', and, cellular, analyses, revealed, that, 'LY3009120']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['ARAF,', 'BRAF,', and, 'CRAF', isoforms, with, similar, 'affinity,', while, vemurafenib, or, dabrafenib, have, little, or, modest, 'CRAF', activity, compared, to, their, 'BRAF', activities])].
[sujeto(['LY3009120']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['BRAF-CRAF', dimerization, but, inhibits, the, phosphorylation, of, downstream, 'MEK', and, 'ERK,', suggesting, that, it, effectively, inhibits, the, kinase, activity, of, 'BRAF-CRAF', heterodimers])].
[sujeto(['Further', analyses, demonstrated, that, 'LY3009120', also]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([various, forms, of, 'RAF', dimers, including, 'BRAF', or, 'CRAF', homodimers])].
[sujeto(['Due', to, these, unique, 'properties,', 'LY3009120', demonstrates, minimal, paradoxical, 'activation,']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['MEK1/2', 'phosphorylation,', and, exhibits, 'anti-tumor', activities, across, multiple, models, carrying, 'KRAS,', 'NRAS,', or, 'BRAF', mutation])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, treatment, of, tumours, with, ionizing, radiation, or, genotoxic, drugs, drives, 'p21-activated', kinase, 1, '(', 'PAK1)-mediated', phosphorylation, of, 'CRAF', on, 'Serine', 338, '(', 'pS338)', triggering, a, 'kinase-independent', mechanism, of, 'DNA', repair, and, therapeutic, resistance])].
[sujeto(['CRAF', pS338]), verbo([recruits]), complemento(['CHK2,', a, cell, cycle, checkpoint, kinase, involved, in, 'DNA', 'repair,', and, promotes, 'CHK2', 'phosphorylation/activation', to, enhance, the, tumour, cell, 'DNA', damage, response])].

[sujeto(['The', coiled, coil, is, a, superhelical, structural, protein, motif]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, a, diverse, array, of, biological, 'functions,', and, the, abnormal, expression, of, the, 'coiled-coil', domain, containing, proteins, has, a, direct, link, with, the, phenotype, of, tumor, cell, 'migration,', invasion, and, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, was, to, investigate, the, critical, role, of, 'Coiled-coil', 'domain-containing', protein, 34, '(', 'CCDC34)', in, bladder, 'carcinogenesis,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([never, been, reported, to, date])].

[sujeto(['Newcastle', disease, virus, '(', 'NDV)']), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, severe, and, economically, significant, disease, affecting, almost, the, entire, poultry, industry, worldwide])].

[sujeto(['Mitochondrial', 'C-Raf', is, a, potential, cancer, therapeutic, 'target,', as, it]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([mitochondrial, function, and, is, localized, to, the, mitochondria, by, its, 'N-terminal', domain])].

[sujeto(['This', study, identified, the, interaction, of, 'C-Raf', with, 'S308']), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento(['DAPK', '(', 'pDAPK(S308)),', which, together, became, colocalized, in, the, mitochondria, to, facilitate, mitochondrial, remodeling])].

[sujeto(['Crystal', structure, simulation, showed, that, 'GW5074']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'C-Raf', and, induced, a, 'C-Raf', conformational, change, that, enhanced, 'sorafenib-binding', affinity])].

[sujeto(['First,', combination, therapy, facilitated, 'pC-Raf(S338)', and, 'pDAPK(S308)', translocation, from, mitochondria, to, 'cytoplasm,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, mitochondrial, dysfunction, and, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', generation])].
[sujeto(['PP2A', then, dissociated, from, the, 'C-Raf-DAPK', complex, and]), verbo([induced]), complemento([profound, cancer, cell, death])].

[sujeto(['Treatments', for, recurrent, or, metastatic, head, and, neck, squamous, cell, carcinoma, '(', 'HNSCC)']), verbo([have]), complemento([limited, efficacy])].
[sujeto(['One', potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, 'HNSCC', is, the, 'RAS/RAF/MEK/ERK', 'cascade,', which, is, one, of, the, major, signaling, pathways, for, 'HNSCC', cell, survival])].
[sujeto(['In', 'HNSCC,', 'RAS', can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([either, by, 'HRAS', mutation, or, by, upstream, signaling])].
[sujeto(['The', 'ABL', inhibitor, nilotinib]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, weak, 'RAF', inhibitor, that, induces, 'RAF', dimerization, and, subsequent, activation, of, 'MEK/ERK', in, other, cancer, cell, lines, with, activated, 'RAS,', leading, to, an, unexpected, dependence, on, 'MEK/ERK', for, cell, survival])].
[sujeto(['Nilotinib']), verbo([induced]), complemento([significant, 'BRAF-CRAF', heterodimerization, and, 'ERK', activation, irrespective, of, 'RAS', mutation, status])].

[sujeto(['Both', 'Cluster', of, 'Differentiation', 166, '(', 'CD166)', and, 'Melanoma', 'Cell', 'Adhesion', 'Molecule', '(', 'MCAM)', play, critical, roles, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([transformative, phenotype, of, 'Hepatocellular', 'Carcinoma', '(', 'HCC)', cells])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CD166', has, a, positive, impact, on, the, expression, of, 'MCAM,', while, 'MCAM', has, no, feedback, on, 'CD166'])].

[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, identified, 'c-Raf/MEK/ERK', signaling]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, downstream, effecter, of, 'CD166/PI3K/AKT', axis, to, stimulate, ubiquitination, and, destability, of, βTrCP, and, 'Smurf1'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', we, establish, a, model, that, 'CD166']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['MCAM', through, a, signaling, flow, from, activation, of, 'PI3K/AKT', and, 'c-Raf/MEK/ERK', signaling, to, the, inhibition, of, potential, 'MCAM', ubiquitin, 'E3', 'ligases,', βTrCP, and, 'Smurf1,', blockage, of, this, signaling, cascade, may, be, useful, in, the, treatment, of, 'CD166', and, 'MCAM-dependent', 'HCC'])].
[sujeto(['Tumors', are, often, greatly, dependent, on, signaling, cascades]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([cell, growth, or, survival, and, may, become, hypersensitive, to, inactivation, of, key, components, within, these, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Ras', and, 'RAF', mutations]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, human, cancer, confer, constitutive, activity, to, these, signaling, molecules, thereby, converting, them, into, an, oncogenic, state])].
[sujeto(['RAF', dimerization, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, normal, 'Ras-dependent', 'RAF', activation, and, is, required, for, the, oncogenic, potential, of, mutant, 'RAFs'])].
[sujeto(['However,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'B-RAF', led, to, significantly, reduced, tumor, growth])].
[sujeto(['The', diminished, tumor, growth, upon, 'B-RAF', inactivation, was, due, to, reduced, cell, proliferation, in, absence, of, senescence, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'B-RAF', elimination]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['C-RAF', 'BxB-mediated', activation, of, the, mitogenic, cascade])].
[sujeto(['In', line, with, these, 'data,', mutation, of, 'Ser-621', in, 'C-RAF', 'BxB', abrogated, in, vitro, the, dimerization, with, 'B-RAF', and, blocked, the, ability, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'MAPK', cascade])].
[sujeto(['Melatonin,', a, neurohormone, secreted, mainly, by, the, pineal, 'gland,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, variety, of, physiological, functions, and, neuroprotective, effects])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, melatonin, could, stimulate, the, proliferation, of, neural, 'stem/progenitor', cells, '(', 'NS/PCs)'])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, the, activities, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', of, neural, stem, cells, '(', 'NSCs)', changed, in, response, to, the, proliferative, effect, of, melatonin])].

[sujeto(['Pretreatment', with, luzindole, or, 'PD98059']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, 'melatonin-induced', increase, in, these, signaling, molecules])].
[sujeto(['The', present, results, showed, that, melatonin, could]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['NS/PCs', to, proliferate, by, increasing, phosphorylation, of, 'ERK1/2', and, 'c-Raf', through, melatonin, receptor])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([further, evidence, for, a, role, of, melatonin, in, promoting, 'neurogenesis,', adding, to, the, remarkably, pleiotropic, nature, of, this, neurohormone])].
[sujeto(['Gastric', cancer, is, the]), verbo([leading]), complemento([cause, of, cancer, death, worldwide])].
[sujeto(['Oridonin,', a, diterpenoid, isolated, from, 'Rabdosia', 'rubescens,']), verbo([has]), complemento([attracted, considerable, attention, as, a, potential, treatment, for, gastric, cancer, based, on, its, 'anti-tumor', effects, in, many, tumor, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['The', results, showed, that, in, 'vitro,', oridonin, potently]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['c-Met', phosphorylation, and, 'c-Met-dependent', cell, proliferation, '(', 'IC50', 'value,', 36.8, 'μM),', meanwhile, 'down-regulated', the, expression, of, the, downstream, signaling, molecules, including, 'phospho-c-Raf,', 'phospho-Erk,', and, 'phospho-Akt'])].

[sujeto(['The', 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, are, structurally]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([throughout, eukaryotes, and, participate, in, protein, kinase, signaling])].
[sujeto(['All', 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, are, known, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, evolutionally, conserved, 'phosphoserine-containing', motifs, '(', modes, 1, 'and/or', 2, ')', with, high, affinity])].
[sujeto([brucei, 14, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, have, previously, been, documented])].
[sujeto([brucei, 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, exhibit, far, lower, affinity, to, those, peptides, containing, 'RSxpSxP', '(', mode, 1, ')', and, 'RxY/FxpSxP', '(', mode, 2, ')', '(', where, x, is, any, amino, acid, residue, and, pS, is, 'phosphoserine)', than, human, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'proteins,', demonstrating, the, atypical]), verbo([target]), complemento([recognition, by, 'T'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, putative, 'T'])].
[sujeto([brucei, protein, phosphatase, 2, 'C', '(', 'PP2c)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'T'])].
[sujeto(['We', constructed, eight, chimeric, 'PP2c', proteins, replacing, its, authentic, mode, 3, motif, with, potential, mode, 3, sequences]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'Trypanosoma', brucei, genome, 'database,', and, tested, their, binding])].
[sujeto([brucei, 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, three, out, of, eight, chimeric, proteins, including, two, with, high, affinity])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', a, synthetic, peptide, derived, from, this, mode, 3, motif]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'T'])].
[sujeto(['Because', of, the, atypical]), verbo([target]), complemento([recognition, of, 'T'])].
[sujeto([brucei, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'proteins,', no, 14, -, 3, -, 3, -]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, have, been, successfully, identified, in, 'T'])].
[sujeto([brucei, until, now, whereas, over, 200, human, 14, -, 3, -, 3, -]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, have, been, identified])].

[sujeto(['The', 'BRAF', 'kinase,', within, the, mitogen]), verbo([activated]), complemento([protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', signaling, 'pathway,', harbors, activating, mutations, in, about, half, of, melanomas, and, to, a, significant, extent, in, many, other, cancers])].
[sujeto(['A', single, valine, to, glutamic, acid, substitution, at, residue, 600, '(', 'BRAF(V600E))', accounts, for, about, 90, '%', of, these]), verbo([activating]), complemento([mutations])].
[sujeto(['While', 'BRAF(V600E)-selective', small, molecule, 'inhibitors,', such, as, debrafenib, and, 'vemurafenib,']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, therapeutic, 'benefit,', almost, all, patients, develop, resistance])].

[sujeto(['Unlike', 'BRAF,', 'CRAF']), verbo([requires]), complemento([continuous, chaperoning, by, 'Hsp90', to, retain, 'MAPK', signaling])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, the, bipartite, role, of, 'Hsp90', in, chaperoning, 'CRAF', kinase])].
[sujeto(['Hsp90', facilitates, 'Ser-621', phosphorylation, of, 'CRAF', and]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, kinase, from, degradation])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, overexpression, of, 'Hsp90']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['MAPK', signaling, by, activating, 'CRAF'])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', the, role, of, 'Hsp90', in, 'CRAF', maturation, and, activation]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, limiting, factor, to, maintain, the, function, of, a, strong, client, like, 'CRAF', kinase])].
[sujeto(['Erianin', is, a, natural, compound]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'Dendrobium', chrysotoxum, 'Lindl'])].
[sujeto(['Erianin']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HG-induced', vascular, endothelial, growth, factor, '(', 'VEGF)', 'expression,', 'hypoxia-inducible', factor, 1, -, alpha, '(', 'HIF-1α)', translocation, into, nucleus, and, 'ERK1/2', activation, in, 'RF/6A', and, microglia, 'BV-2', cells])].

[sujeto(['Chronic', myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'CML)', is, a, severe, problem, throughout, the, world, and]), verbo([requires]), complemento([identification, of, novel, targets, for, its, treatment])].
[sujeto(['In', 'here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([discussed, the, potential, role, of, various, miRNAs, that, are, found, involved, in, regulating, the, proteins, cascades, of, 'MAPK', signaling, pathway, associated, with, 'CML'])].
[sujeto(['An', emphasis]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, paid, to, summarize, the, influence, of, various, miRNAs, in, elevating, or, suppressing, the, expression, level, of, significant, proteins, such, as, 'miR-203,', 'miR-196a,', 'miR-196b,', 'miR-30a,', 'miR-29b,', 'miR-138', in, 'BCR-ABL', tyrosine, 'kinase;', 'miR-126,', 'miR-221,', 'miR-128,', 'miR-15a,', 'miR-188-5p,', 'miR-17', in, 'CRK', family, 'proteins;', 'miR-155,', 'miR-181a', with, 'SOS', 'proteins;', 'miR-155,', 'miR-19a,', with, 'KRAS', 'proteins;', 'miR-19a', with, 'RAF1', 'protein;', and, 'miR-17,', 'miR-19a,', 'miR-17-92', cluster, with, 'MAPK/ERK', proteins])].
[sujeto(['In', light, of, 'ever-increasing', importance, and, 'ever-widening', regulatory, roles, of, miRNAs, in, 'cells,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([reviewed, the, recent, progress, in, the, field, of, miRNAs, and, have, tried, to, suggest, them, as, controlling, targets, for, various, protein, cascades, of, 'MAPK', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['An', understanding, of, the, supervisory, mechanism, of, 'MAPK', by, miRNAs, might]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, targets, for, treating, 'CML'])].
[sujeto(['Emerging', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, constitutive, activation, of, various, signaling, pathways, like, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase-extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'MAPK-Erk)', signaling, plays, a, role, in, the, heterogeneous, clinical, outcome, of, 'CLL', patients])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, role, of, 'Sprouty', '(', 'SPRY)2', as, a, negative, regulator, of, receptor, and, nonreceptor, tyrosine, kinase, signaling, in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'CLL'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'SPRY2', expression, is, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'CLL', 'cells,', particularly, from, 'poor-prognosis', patients, compared, with, those, from, 'good-prognosis', patients])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'SPRY2', in, 'CLL', cells, from, 'poor-prognosis', patients]), verbo([increased]), complemento([their, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', downregulation, of, 'SPRY2', in, 'CLL', cells, from, 'good-prognosis', patients, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', 'B-cell-specific', transgenic, overexpression, of, spry2, in, mice]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, decrease, in, the, frequency, of, 'B1', 'cells,', the, precursors, of, 'CLL', cells, in, rodents])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', we, show, that, 'SPRY2', attenuates, the, 'B-cell', receptor, '(', 'BCR)', and, 'MAPK-Erk', signaling, by]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, and, antagonizing, the, activities, of, 'RAF1,', 'BRAF,', and, spleen, tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'SYK)', in, normal, 'B', cells, and, 'CLL', cells])].
[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, 'SPRY2', is]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, 'microRNA-21,', which, in, turn, leads, to, increased, activity, of, 'Syk', and, 'Erk', in, 'CLL', cells])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, establish, 'SPRY2', as, a, critical, negative, regulator, of, 'BCR-mediated', 'MAPK-Erk', signaling, in, 'CLL,', thereby]), verbo([providing]), complemento([one, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, to, explain, the, clinical, heterogeneity, of, 'CLL'])].
[sujeto(['RASopathies', are, autosomal, dominant, disorders]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, more, than, 10, known, genes, that, regulate, the, 'RAS/MAPK', pathway])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, identified, mutations, in, 'RIT1', in, patients, with, 'NS'])].
[sujeto(['M90I,']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['Elk1', transactivation])].

[sujeto(['We', recently]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'TMPRSS2:ERG', fusion, genes, and, 'PTEN', 'loss,', which, are, common, in, 'Western', prostate, cancers, are, infrequent, in, 'Chinese', cases])].
[sujeto(['As', previous, studies, indicated, a, higher, frequency, of, 'RAS', and, 'BRAF', mutation, rates, in, 'Eastern', 'Asian', than, in, 'Western', prostate, cancers, and, fusion, genes]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, 'RAF', family, genes, 'BRAF', and, 'RAF1', were, recently, identified, in, prostate, cancer, in, the, 'American', 'population,', we, investigated, 'BRAF', and, 'RAF1', alterations, in, 'Chinese', prostate, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Using', fluorescence, in, situ, 'hybridization,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'BRAF', was, truncated, in, five, of, 200, informative, 'Chinese', cases, '(', 2.5, '%', ')', and, that, 'RAF1', was, truncated, in, three, of, 204, informative, cases, '(', 1.5, '%', ')', and, genomic, rearrangements, of, these, genes, were, significantly, correlated, with, high, 'Gleason', scores, '(', &, 'gt;7;', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', and, have, a, trend, to, appear, in, high, clinical, stage, disease])].
[sujeto(['A', high, frequency, of, 'BRAF', and, 'RAF1', copy, number]), verbo([gain]), complemento([was, found, '(', 29, and, 15, '%', ',', 'respectively)'])].
[sujeto(['BRAF', copy, number]), verbo([gain]), complemento([in, 'Chinese', cancers, was, significantly, higher, than, in, 'UK', cases, '(', 9.2, '%', ')', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', and, correlated, with, a, number, of, clinical, parameters])].
[sujeto(['High-level', expression, of, 'BRAF', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([by, immunohistochemistry, in, 'Chinese', cancer, samples, compared, with, adjacent, nonmalignant, epithelial, 'cells,', which, was, correlated, with, high, 'BRAF', copy, number])].
[sujeto(['Our']), verbo([finding]), complemento([suggests, that, the, activation, of, the, 'RAS/RAF/MEK/ERK', pathway, may, be, frequent, in, 'Chinese', prostate, 'cancer,', with, 'RAF', gene, copy, number, gain, potentially, being, the, main, contributor])].
[sujeto(['NS', is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, germ, line, mutations, in, several, components, of, the, 'RAS-RAF-MEK-extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', 'pathway,', including, both, 'kinase-activating', and, 'kinase-impaired', alleles, of, 'RAF1', '(', '∼3', to, 5, '%', ')', ',', which, encodes, a, 'serine-threonine', kinase, for, 'MEK1/2'])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, how, 'kinase-impaired', 'RAF1', mutants]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['NS,', we, generated, 'knock-in', mice, expressing, 'Raf1(D486N)'])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', 'Mek/Erk', activation, was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'Raf1(D486N)-expressing', cells, compared, with, controls])].
[sujeto(['RAF1(D486N),', as, well, as, other, 'kinase-impaired', 'RAF1', 'mutants,', showed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([heterodimerization, with, 'BRAF,', which, was, necessary, and, sufficient, to, promote, increased, 'MEK/ERK', activation])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'kinase-activating', 'RAF1', mutants, also]), verbo([required]), complemento([heterodimerization, to, enhance, 'MEK/ERK', activation])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, an, increased, heterodimerization, ability, is, the, common, pathogenic, mechanism, for, 'NS-associated', 'RAF1', mutations])].
[sujeto(['Genotyping']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, more, precise, diagnosis, in, 26, patients])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', and, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, signaling, cascades, have, been, implicated, in, a, number, of, human, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Critical', proteins, in, both, pathways, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([following, treatment, of, 'Eker', rats, '(', 'Tsc-2(EK/+))', with, the, nephrocarcinogen, 2, ',', 3, ',', 5, -, 'tris-(glutathion-S-yl)hydroquinone', '(', 'TGHQ),', which, also, results, in, loss, of, the, 'wild-type', allele, of, 'Tsc-2', in, renal, preneoplastic, lesions, and, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Western', blot, analysis, of, kidney, tumors, formed, following, treatment, of, 'Tsc-2(EK/+)', rats, with, 'TGHQ', for, 8, months, revealed]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'B-Raf,', 'Raf-1,', 'pERK,', cyclin, 'D1,', '4EBP1,', and, 'p-4EBP1-Ser65,', -, 'Thr70,', and, -, 'Thr37/46', expression])].

[sujeto(['The', data, indicate, that, 'Raf-1/MEK/ERK']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, crosstalk, with, '4EBP1,', which, represents, a, novel, pathway, interaction, leading, to, increased, protein, 'synthesis,', cell, 'growth,', and, kidney, tumor, formation])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', 'loss-of-function', studies, in, murine, tumor, models]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, essential, in, the, analysis, of, downstream, mediators, of, oncogenic, transformation])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, describe, a, versatile, method, allowing, the, efficient, expression, of, an, oncogene, and, simultaneous, knockdown, of]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, interest, '(', 'TOI)', from, a, single, retroviral, vector])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'β-lap', provoked, the, cleavage, of, heat, shock, protein, 90, '(', 'Hsp90)', in, quinone, 'oxidoreductase-1', '(', 'NQO1)-expressing', lung, and, prostate, cancer, cells, as, well, as, in, primary, human, umbilical, vein, endothelial, cells, '(', 'HUVECs)'])].

[sujeto(['Mitosis', and, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)', receptor, '(', 'EGFR)', are, both]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, cancer, therapy])].

[sujeto(['The', limited, studies, indicate, that, the, activation, of, 'EGFR', and, downstream, signaling, pathways, is, mostly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([during, mitosis])].

[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, contrary, to, the, 'dogma,', 'EGFR', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'EGF', during, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'EGFR-mediated', cell, signaling, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([differently, from, the, interphase, to, specifically, serve, the, needs, of, the, cell, in, mitosis])].

[sujeto(['The', results, showed, that, 'CDG']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, proliferation, of, cancer, cells, '(', 'IC50:', 13.6, -, 67.4, microg])].

[sujeto(['The', result, of, animal, toxicity, test, on, the, mice]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'CDG', had, lower, toxicity, than, 'GDM'])].
[sujeto(['Meanwhile,', 'CDG']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, growth, of, 'MCF-7', xenografts, of, athymic, mice])].

[sujeto(['Several', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, reactive, astrocytes, 're-express', 'markers,', such, as, 'Nestin,', which, are, normally, expressed, in, neural, stem, cells])].

[sujeto(['This', is, the, first, study, to, show, that, 'Nestin', expression, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, an, extracellular, signaling, molecule, in, reactive, astrocytes])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'androgen-deprived', 'LNCaP', 'cells,', in, which, 'ERK1/2', activation, occurs, in, strong, correlation, with, 'AKT', 'activation,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'AKT-mediated', 'B-Raf', regulation, is, necessary, for, 'ERK1/2', activation])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, 'Raf', kinase, inhibitory, protein, '(', 'RKIP)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'MAPK', when, 'B-Raf', signaling, is, defective])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'RKIP', depletion, can, rescue, the, compromised, 'ERK', activation, and]), verbo([promote]), complemento(['proliferation,', and, this, rescue, occurs, through, a, 'Raf-1', dependent, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([formal, evidence, that, 'RKIP', is, a, bona, fide, regulator, of, 'Raf-1'])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, a, new, model, in, which, 'RKIP', plays, a, key, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, ability, of, cells, to, signal, through, 'Raf-1', to, 'ERK', in, 'B-Raf', compromised, cells])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, tumor, necrosis, factor, 'receptor-1', can]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([survival, or, apoptosis, pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', many, cellular, 'models,', including, the, neuronal, cell, model, 'PC12,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, that, inhibition, of, protein, synthesis, is, sufficient, to, render, cells, sensitive, to, apoptosis, induced, by, 'TNFα'])].
[sujeto(['The', survival, effect, is, linked, to, the, translocation, of, the, transcription, factor]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-kappa', 'B', '(', 'NF-κB)', to, the, nucleus, and, activation, of, 'survival-related', genes, such, as, 'FLICE-like', inhibitory, protein, long, form, '(', 'FLIP-L)', or, 'IAPs'])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, 'NF-κB-induced']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'FLIP-L', expression, levels, is, essential, for, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinases/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinases, '(', 'MAPK/ERK)', activation])].

[sujeto(['From', a, functional, point, of, 'view,', we, show, that, inhibition, of, the, 'MAPK/ERK', pathway, and, the, 'NF-κB', pathway, are, equally, relevant, to, render, 'PC12', cells, sensitive, to, cell, death]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'TNFα'])].
[sujeto(['Apoptosis']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'TNFα', under, these, conditions, is, dependent, on, jun, nuclear, 'kinase1/2', 'JNK1/2-dependent', 'Bim', upregulation])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, previously, undescribed, and, essential, role, for, 'MAPK/ERK', activation, by, 'FLIP-L', in, the, decision, between, cell, survival, and, apoptosis, upon, 'TNFα', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous]), verbo([report]), complemento([showed, that, thrombin, activates, the, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)α/c-Src', and, 'Gβγ/Rac1/PI3K/Akt', signaling, pathways, to, induce, 'IκB', kinase, 'α/β', '(', 'IKKα/β)', 'activation,', 'NF-κB', 'transactivation,', and, 'IL-8/CXCL8', expressions, in, human, lung, epithelial, cells, '(', 'ECs)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, further, investigated, the, mechanism, of, 'c-Src-dependent', 'Shc,', 'Raf-1,', and, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', signaling, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'thrombin-induced', 'NF-κB', activation, and, 'IL-8/CXCL8', release])].
[sujeto(['Thrombin-induced']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'IL-8/CXCL8', release, and, 'κB-luciferase', activity, were, inhibited, by, the, 'Shc', small, interfering, 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA),', p66Shc, 'siRNA,', 'GW', 5074, '(', a, 'Raf-1', 'inhibitor),', and, 'PD98059', '(', a, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', kinase, '(', 'MEK)', 'inhibitor)'])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'A549', cells, with, thrombin]), verbo([increased]), complemento([p66Shc, and, 'p46/p52Shc', phosphorylation, at, 'Tyr239/240', and, 'Tyr317,', which, was, inhibited, by, cell, transfection, with, the, dominant, negative, mutant, of, 'c-Src', '(', 'c-Src', 'DN)'])].
[sujeto(['Thrombin']), verbo([caused]), complemento(['time-dependent', phosphorylation, of, 'Raf-1', and, 'ERK,', which, was, attenuated, by, the, 'c-Src', 'DN'])].
[sujeto(['Thrombin-induced', 'IKKα/β', phosphorylation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'GW', 5074, and, 'PD98059'])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, cells, with, thrombin]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['Gβγ,', 'c-Src,', and, p66Shc, complex, formation, in, a, 'time-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, show, for, the, first, time, that, thrombin]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Shc,', 'Raf-1,', and, 'ERK', through, 'Gβγ,', 'c-Src,', and, 'Shc', complex, formation, to, induce, 'IKKα/β', 'phosphorylation,', 'NF-κB', 'activation,', and, 'IL-8/CXCL8', release, in, human, lung, 'ECs'])].
[sujeto(['Before', entering, 'mitosis,', the, stacks, of, the, 'Golgi', cisternae, are, separated, from, each, 'other,', and]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([this, process, delays, entry, of, mammalian, cells, into, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['Protein', kinase, 'D', '(', 'PKD)', is, known, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Golgi-to-cell', surface, transport, by, controlling, the, biogenesis, of, specific, transport, carriers])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, depletion, of, 'PKD1', and, 'PKD2', proteins, from, 'HeLa', cells, by, small, interfering, 'RNA']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, accumulation, of, cells, in, the, 'G2', phase, of, the, cell, cycle, and, prevents, cells, from, entering, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, inhibition, of, 'PKD', blocks, mitotic, 'Raf-1', and, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, '(', 'MEK)', 'activation,', 'and,', as, a, 'consequence,', mitotic, 'Golgi', 'fragmentation,', which, could, be, rescued, by, expression, of, active, 'MEK1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PKD', controls, interstack, 'Golgi', connections, in, a, 'Raf-1/MEK1-dependent', 'manner,', a, process, required, for, entry, of, the, cells, into, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['Cigarette', smoke, exposure, is, strongly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, airway, hyperreactivity, '(', 'AHR)', which, is, the, main, characteristic, seen, in, asthma])].
[sujeto(['The', intracellular, 'MAPK', signaling, pathways, are]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, be, associated, with, the, airway, damage, to, the, 'AHR'])].
[sujeto(['The', mRNA, transcription, and, protein, translation, of, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([receptors, and, the, kinases, in, 'Raf/ERK/MAPK', pathway, were, investigated, by, 'real-time', 'PCR,', 'Western', blotting, and, 'immunofluorescence,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Compared', with, exposure, to, fresh, 'air,', 'SHS']), verbo([induced]), complemento([enhanced, bronchial, contractile, responses, mediated, by, the, 5, -, hydroxytryptamine, 2, 'A', '(', 5, -, 'HT(2A))', receptors, as, well, as, the, endothelin, type, 'B', '(', 'ET(B))', and, type, 'A', '(', 'ET(A))', receptors])].

[sujeto(['A', 'Raf-1', inhibitor, '(', 'GW5074)']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, 'SHS-induced', increase, in, the, expression, of, 5, -, 'HT(2A)', and, 'ET(A)', receptors, and, the, 'receptor-mediated', 'AHR'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, show, that, 'SHS', exposure]), verbo([induces]), complemento([transcriptional, upregulation, of, the, 5, -, 'HT(2A),', 'ET(B)', and, 'ET(A)', receptors, in, rat, bronchial, smooth, muscle, 'cells,', which, mediates, 'AHR'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Raf/ERK/MAPK', pathway, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'SHS-associated', receptor, upregulation, and, 'AHR'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Raf', kinases, '(', 'Raf-1,', 'b-Raf', and, 'a-Raf)', directly]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'Ras', and, serve, as, mediators, of, mitogenic, signals])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies, emphasized, the, importance, of, 'Raf-1', and, 'b-Raf', in]), verbo([preventing]), complemento([apoptosis, in, addition, to, their, roles, in, cell, growth])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, examined, whether, inhibition, of, the, 'Raf-1', or, 'b-Raf', kinase]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([cell, growth, and, increases, apoptosis, in, colon, cancer, cells])].

[sujeto(['Twenty-two', &, 'beta;-resorcylic', acid, lactones, '(', 'RALs)', were, evaluated, for, cytotoxicity, against, human, breast, cancer, cells, to]), verbo([find]), complemento([their, 'structure-activity', relationship, '(', 'SAR)'])].
[sujeto(['Monocillin', 'II,', a, 'trans-enone', 'RAL', without, epoxy, and, conjugated, 'dienone,', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, have, higher, activity, in, inhibiting, tumor, cell, growth, in, both, in, vitro, experiment, and, in, vivo, nude, xenografted, mice, model, than, its, analogue, 'radicicol,', an, anticancer, lead, compound])].

[sujeto(['Licorice', is, a, traditional, botanical, 'medicine,', and]), verbo([has]), complemento([historically, been, commonly, prescribed, in, 'Asia', to, treat, various, diseases])].
[sujeto(['However,', high, intake, or, 'long-term', consumption, of, 'Gc']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, a, number, of, side, 'effects,', including, hypertension])].

[sujeto(['Store-operated', 'Ca(2+)', entry, '(', 'SOCE)', is, a, major, mechanism, of, 'Ca(2)', '(', +, ')', import, from, extracellular, to, intracellular, 'space,']), verbo([involving]), complemento([detection, of, 'Ca(2+)', store, depletion, in, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER)', by, stromal, interaction, molecule, '(', 'STIM)', 'proteins,', which, then, translocate, to, plasma, membrane, and, activate, 'Orai', 'Ca(2+)', channels, there])].

[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, therapies, targeting, both, 'Raf', 'kinase-dependent', and, -, independent, pathways, may, be, effective, against, a, broader, range, of, malignancies, and, reduce, the, risks, of, adverse, effects, 'and/or', resistance])].

[sujeto(['The', dimerisation, of, 'Raf', kinases]), verbo([involves]), complemento([a, central, cluster, within, the, kinase, 'domain,', the, dimer, interface, '(', 'DIF)'])].

[sujeto(['Increased', activity, of, 'B-Raf']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, in, approximately, 7, '%', of, human, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'Eker', rats, '(', 'Tsc-2(EK/+)', ')', ',', bearing, a, mutation, in, one, allele, of, the, tuberous, 'sclerosis-2', '(', 'Tsc-2)', 'gene,', with, the, nephrocarcinogen, 2, ',', 3, ',', 5, -, 'tris-(glutathion-S-yl)', hydroquinone, '(', 'TGHQ)', results, in]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, 'wild-type', allele, of, 'Tsc-2', in, renal, preneoplastic, lesions, and, tumors])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Raf', kinase, inhibitor, protein, 1, '(', 'RKIP-1)', was, the, first]), verbo([reported]), complemento([endogenous, inhibitor, of, 'Raf-1-MEK-ERK/MAPK', 'cascade,', by, interfering, with, the, phosphorylation, of, 'MEK', by, 'Raf-1'])].

[sujeto(['We', also, focus, on, several, discrepancies, and, questions, that, 'remain,', such, as, the, 'RKIP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([regulation, by, 'Raf-1', 'N-region', 'phosphorylation,', the, possible, 'B-Raf', 'inhibition,', and, the, effects, of, 'RKIP-lipid', binding])].
[sujeto(['We', also, describe, how, 'RKIP\'s', role, as, key, signaling, modulator, of, many, cell, fate, decisions]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, fact, that, fine, control, of, 'RKIP', activity, and, regulation, is, crucial, to, avoid, pathological, 'processes,', such, as, 'metastasis,', pulmonary, arterial, 'hypertension,', and, heart, failure])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, the, upregulation, of, 'mortalin,', an, 'Hsp70', family, 'chaperone,', is, important, for, 'B-Raf(V600E)', tumor, cells, to, bypass, 'p21(CIP1)', 'expression,', which, is, activated, as, a, 'tumor-suppressive', mechanism, in, response, to, aberrant, 'MEK/ERK', activation, '(', 'Wu', et, al])].

[sujeto(['RKIP', was, diffusely]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, normal, mucosa, and, progressively, lost, towards, tumour, centre, and, front, '(', 'P&lt;0'])].

[sujeto(['Araf', kinase]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, inhibit, 'TGF-&beta;/Smad2', signaling, by, directly, phosphorylating, and, accelerating, degradation, of, activated, 'Smad2'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, that, the, araf, gene]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([in, zebrafish, embryos, to, produce, a, shorter, transcript, 'variant,', 'araf-tv2,', in, addition, to, the, 'full-length', variant, 'araf-tv1'])].
[sujeto(['Araf-tv2', can, physically]), verbo([associate]), complemento([with, 'Araf-tv1', but, does, not, antagonize, the, inhibitory, effect, of, 'Araf-tv1', on, 'TGF-&beta;/Smad2', signaling])].
