[sujeto(['Therefore,', different, isoforms, of, 'Araf', may]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, similar, developmental, processes, but, by, regulating, different, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RAF', proteins, are, cytosolic, protein, kinases, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cell, responses, to, extracellular, signals])].
[sujeto(['There', are, three, 'RAF', proteins, in, 'cells,', 'ARAF,', 'BRAF', and, 'CRAF,', and, recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, the, formation, of, complexes, by, these, different, isoforms, has, an, important, role, in, their, 'activation,', particularly, in, response, to, 'RAF', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, the, role, of, 'ARAF', in, cancer, cell, signaling, and, examined, the, role, of, 'ARAF', in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([paradoxical, activation, of, the, 'MAPK', pathway, in, cells, treated, with, 'RAF', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, two, mutations, that, occur, in, 'ARAF', in, cancer]), verbo([inactivate]), complemento([the, kinase])].
[sujeto(['We', further, show, that, 'ARAF']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, and, is, activated, by, 'BRAF', and, that, 'ARAF', also, forms, complexes, with, 'CRAF'])].
[sujeto(['Critically,', 'ARAF', seems, to, stabilize, 'BRAF:CRAF', complexes, in, cells, treated, with, 'RAF', inhibitors, and, thereby]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cell, signaling, in, a, subtle, manner, to, ensure, signaling, efficiency])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RAS-RAF-MEK-ERK-MAP', kinase, pathway]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([cellular, responses, to, growth, signals])].
[sujeto(['The', three, 'RAF', genes, code, for, cytoplasmic, 'serine/threonine', kinases, that, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, binding, 'RAS'])].
[sujeto(['In', human, papillary, thyroid, cancers, '(', 'PTCs),', mutations, of, 'RET/PTC,', 'NTRK,', 'RAS,', or, 'BRAF', are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, about, two, thirds, of, cases, with, practically, no, 'overlap,', providing, genetic, evidence, that, constitutive, signaling, along, 'RET-RAS-BRAF-MAPK', is, key, to, their, development])].
[sujeto(['The', requirement, for, 'BRAF', in, 'RET/PTC-mediated', 'MAPK', activation, and, gene, expression]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, tested, functionally])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, the, key, 'RAF', isoform]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['RET/PTC-induced', 'ERK', 'phosphorylation,', we, stably, transfected, 'doxycycline-inducible', 'RET/PTC3-expressing', thyroid, 'PCCL3', cells, with, small, interfering, 'RNA', vectors, to, induce, selective, knockdown, of, 'BRAF', or, 'CRAF'])].
[sujeto(['Conditional', 'RET/PTC3', expression]), verbo([induced]), complemento([comparable, 'ERK', phosphorylation, in, 'CRAF', knockdown, and, control, cells, but, negligible, 'ERK', phosphorylation, in, 'BRAF', knockdown, cells])].
[sujeto(['Selective', knockdown, of, 'BRAF']), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['RET/PTC-dependent', 'down-regulation', of, the, sodium, iodide, 'symporter,', a, gene, that, confers, key, biological, effects, of, 'RET/PTC', in, 'PTCs'])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, 'BRAF', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'RET/PTC-induced', 'MAPK', activation, in, thyroid, cells, and, support, the, notion, that, 'BRAF', inactivation, may, be, an, attractive, target, for, 'PTCs'])].
[sujeto(['Tyrosine', kinase, growth, factor, receptors, and, 'Ras/Raf/MEK/MAPK', signalling]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, suppression, as, well, as, augmentation, of, programmed, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', a, 'Ras-independent', role, for, 'Raf', as, a, suppressor, of, programmed, cell, death]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, by, the, recent, finding, that, 'Craf1', interacts, with, members, of, the, 'Bcl-2', family, at, mitochondrial, membranes])].
[sujeto([elegans, and, 'Drosophila,', as, well, as, the]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([mutagenesis, of, the, murine, 'Araf', 'gene,', have, failed, to, support, such, a, role])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, mice, with, a]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([disruption, in, the, 'Braf', gene, die, of, vascular, defects, during, 'mid-gestation'])].
[sujeto([',', 'unpublished),', show, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([number, of, endothelial, precursor, 'cells,', dramatically, enlarged, blood, vessels, and, apoptotic, death, of, differentiated, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['These', results, establish, 'Braf', as, a, critical, signalling, factor, in, the, formation, of, the, vascular, system, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, genetic, evidence, for, an, essential, role, of, 'Raf', gene, in, the, regulation, of, programmed, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Ras-Raf-MEK-MAPK', '(', 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase)-signaling', pathway, plays, a, key, role, in, the, regulation, of, many, cellular, 'functions,', including, cell, 'proliferation,', differentiation, and, 'transformation,', by, transmitting, signals, from, membrane, receptors, to, various, cytoplasmic, and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([targets])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Raf', family, kinases, '(', 'A-Raf,', 'B-Raf', and, 'C-Raf)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, intensively, studied, since, being, identified, in, the, early, 1980, s, as, retroviral, 'oncogenes,', especially, with, respect, to, the, discovery, of, activating, mutations, of, 'B-Raf', in, a, large, number, of, tumors, which, led, to, intensified, efforts, to, develop, drugs, targeting, 'Raf', kinases])].
[sujeto(['This', also, resulted, in, a, rapid]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, our, knowledge, of, the, biological, functions, of, the, 'B-Raf', and, 'C-Raf', 'isoforms,', which, may, in, turn, be, contrasted, with, the, little, that, is, known, about, 'A-Raf'])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', emerging, evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([begun, to, reveal, the, functions, of, 'A-Raf,', of, which, some, are, 'kinase-independent'])].
[sujeto(['These', include, the, inhibition, of, apoptosis, by]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'MST2,', acting, as, safeguard, against, oncogenic, transformation, by, suppressing, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinases, '(', 'ERK)', activation, and, playing, a, role, in, resistance, to, 'Raf', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([number, of, studies, report, that, the, 'Ras/Raf/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, 1, /, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2)', signaling, pathway, has, a, 'death-promoting', apoptotic, function, in, neural, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, the, 'Ras/Raf/ERK1/2', signaling, pathway, may, be, abnormally]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, rat, injured, spinal, cord, models])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'Ras/Raf/ERK1/2', signaling, may, be, upregulated, in, injured, spinal, cord, and, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, recovery, after, spinal, cord, injury])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, de, novo, expression, and, clinical, implications, of, 'COT', in, papillary, thyroid, cancer, '(', 'PTC)']), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, investigated])].
[sujeto(['In', multivariate, 'analysis,', tumor, recurrence, was, persistently]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'moderate-to-strong', staining, of, 'COT', after, adjusting, for, 'age,', 'sex,', extrathyroidal, 'extension,', 'multifocality,', 'T-stage,', 'N-stage,', 'TNM', 'stage,', and, 'B-RAF', mutation, '(', odds, 'ratio,', 4.662, ;, 95, '%', confidence, interval, 1.066, &, #, 8202, ;, -, &, #, 8202, ;, 21.609, ;, 'P&#8202;=&#8202;0'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'moderate-to-strong', 'COT', expression, in, 'PTC', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, shorter, 'recurrence-free', survival, '(', mean, 'follow-up', 'duration,', 14.2, &, #, 8202, ;, &, 'plusmn;&#8202;4'])].
[sujeto(['Aberrant', expression, of, 'A-,', 'B-,', and, 'C-RAF,', and, 'COT', is, frequent, in, 'PTC;']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'COT', is, correlated, with, recurrence, of, 'PTC'])].
[sujeto(['Extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinases, '(', 'ERKs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, to, be, dispensable, for, 'self-renewal', of, mouse, embryonic, stem, '(', 'ES)', 'cells,', and, simultaneous, inhibition, of, both, 'ERK', signaling, and, glycogen, synthase, kinase, 3, '(', 'GSK3)', not, only, allows, mouse, 'ES', cells, to, 'self-renew', independent, of, extracellular, stimuli, but, also, enables, more, efficient, derivation, of, 'na&iuml;ve', 'ES', cells, from, mouse, and, rat, strains])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', some, 'ERKs', stay, active, in, mouse, 'ES', cells, which, are]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([in, regular, medium, containing, leukemia, inhibitory, factor, '(', 'LIF)', and, bone, morphogenetic, protein, '(', 'BMP)'])].
[sujeto(['Yet,', the, upstream, signaling, for, 'ERK', activation, and, their, roles, in, mouse, 'ES', 'cells,', other, than]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([or, priming, 'differentiation,', have, not, been, determined])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, mouse, 'ES', cells, express, three, forms, of, 'Raf', 'kinases,', 'A-Raf,', 'B-Raf,', and, 'C-Raf'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'B-Raf', and, 'C-Raf', double, 'knockdown,', not, 'A-Raf', and, 'B-Raf', 'knockdown,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, maximal, 'ERK', activation, induced, by, 'LIF,', concomitant, with, the, slower, growth, of, 'ES', cells])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'A-Raf,', 'B-Raf,', and, 'C-Raf', triple, knockdown, markedly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([both, the, maximal, and, sustained, 'ERK', activity, in, 'ES', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'Raf', triple, 'knockdown,', similar, to, the, treatment, of, 'U-0126,', an, 'MEK', 'inhibitor,', significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, survival, and, proliferation, of, 'ES', 'cells,', thereby, compromising, the, colony, propagation, of, mouse, 'ES', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', our, data, demonstrate, that, all, three, 'Raf', members, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'ERK', activation, in, mouse, 'ES', cells, and, are, involved, in, growth, and, survival, of, mouse, 'ES', cells])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, aberrant, activation, of, downstream, signaling, pathways, involving, the, 'RAF', kinases])].
[sujeto(['However,', they, paradoxically]), verbo([promote]), complemento([the, growth, of, 'RAS', mutant, 'tumors,', partly, due, to, the, complex, interplay, between, different, 'homo-', and, heterodimers, of, 'A-RAF,', 'B-RAF,', and, 'C-RAF'])].
[sujeto(['CN-A']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, inhibitory, 14, -, 3, -, 3, interaction, sites, of, 'C-RAF,', 'pSer233,', and, 'pSer259,', but, not, to, the, activating, interaction, 'site,', pSer621])].
[sujeto(['While', 'CN-A', alone, is, inactive, in, 'RAS', mutant, cancer, 'models,', combined, treatment, with, 'CN-A', and, an, 'anti-EGFR', antibody, synergistically]), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([tumor, growth, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['We', and, others]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, demonstrated, that, 'c-SRC', is, a, key, mediator, of, 'growth,', 'invasion,', and, 'metastasis,', and, therefore, represents, a, promising, therapeutic, target, in, thyroid, cancer])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'clinically,', 'Src', inhibitor, efficacy]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'limited,', and, therefore, further, insights, are, needed, to, define, resistance, mechanisms, and, determine, rational, combination, therapies])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, four, thyroid, cancer, cell, lines, with, a, greater, than, 30, -, fold, increase, in, acquired, resistance, to, the, 'Src', inhibitor, dasatinib])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', activation, of, the, 'MAPK', pathway, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, all, four, of, the, 'dasatinib-resistant', cell, 'lines,', likely, due, to, 'B-Raf', and, 'c-Raf', dimerization])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'MAP2K1/MAP2K2', '(', 'MEK1/2)', inhibition, restored, sensitivity, in, all, four, of, the, 'dasatinib-resistant', cell, 'lines,', and, overcame, acquired, resistance, to, dasatinib, in, the, 'RAS-mutant', 'Cal62', cell, 'line,', in, vivo, 'Together,', these, studies, demonstrate, that, acquisition, of, the, 'c-SRC', gatekeeper, mutation, and, 'MAPK', pathway, signaling, play, important, roles, in]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([resistance, to, the, 'Src', inhibitor, dasatinib])].
[sujeto(['Vemurafenib', and, dabrafenib, are, two, clinically, approved, inhibitors, for, 'BRAF', that, efficiently]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([the, kinase, activity, of, oncogenic, 'BRAF', '(', 'V600E)'])].
[sujeto(['However', in, 'wild-type', 'BRAF']), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['cells,', 'BRAF', inhibitors, can, exert, paradoxical, activation, of, 'wild-type', 'CRAF'])].
[sujeto(['Dabrafenib']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([activity, of, 'light-stimulated', 'CRAF', at, low, dose, and, inhibited, 'CRAF', signaling, at, high, dose])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', dabrafenib]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, protein, level, of, 'CRAF', proteins, but, not, of, 'BRAF', proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', experiments, to, be, replicated, are, those]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, 'Figures', 1, 'A,', 1, 'B,', 3, 'A,', 3, 'B,', and, 4, 'D'])].
[sujeto(['Heidorn', and, colleagues]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, paradoxical, activation, of, the, 'RAF-RAS-MEK-ERK', pathway, by, 'BRAF', inhibitors, when, applied, to, 'BRAF(WT)', cells, is, a, result, of, 'BRAF/CRAF', heterodimer, formation, upon, inactivation, of, 'BRAF', kinase, 'activity,', and, occurs, only, in, the, context, of, active, 'RAS'])].
[sujeto(['However,', paradoxical, activation, by, structurally, diverse, 'ATP-competitive', 'RAF', kinase, inhibitors, strongly]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, selective, 'CRAF', 'inhibitors,', not, 'BRAF', 'inhibitors,', would, be, ideal, for, some, 'Ras', mutation, cancer, treatment])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'respect,', we, approached, designing, selective, 'CRAF', inhibitors, starting, from, in, silico, fragment, screening, and]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([a, 3, -, 'carboxamido-2H-indazole-6-arylamide', scaffold])].
[sujeto(['Most', of, the, compounds, showed, potent, antiproliferative, activity, against, the, 'WM3629', melanoma, cell, line, and, the, most, promising, 'compound,', compound, 10, 'd,', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, a, potent, and, selective, 'CRAF', inhibitor, with, an, 'IC50', value, of, 38.6, 'nM,', which, shows, greater, than, 270, -, fold, selectivity, over, 'BRAF', kinase, '(', 9.45, &, 'mu;M)'])].
[sujeto(['Heat', shock, protein, '(', 'HSP)90', inhibitors]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, significant, 'anti-tumor', activities, in, preclinical, settings, in, both, solid, and, hematological, tumors])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, the, 'novel,', orally, available, 'HSP90&alpha;/&beta;', inhibitor, 'TAS-116', shows, significant, 'anti-MM', activities])].
[sujeto(['TAS-116', monotherapy, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([growth, of, 'RAS-mutated', 'MM', cell, lines, and, was, associated, with, decreased, expression, of, downstream, target, proteins, of, the, 'RAS-RAF-MEK-ERK', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', treatment, with, these, inhibitors, paradoxically]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['p-C-Raf,', 'p-MEK,', and, 'p-ERK', 'activity,', which, was, abrogated, by, 'TAS-116'])].
[sujeto(['TAS-116', also]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['dabrafenib-induced', 'MM', cytotoxicity, associated, with, mitochondrial, 'damage-induced', 'apoptosis,', even, in, the, 'BRAF-mutated', 'U266', 'MM', cell, line])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([apoptosis, in, 'RAS-mutated', 'MM', triggered, by, combination, treatment, was, observed, even, in, the, presence, of, bone, marrow, stromal, cells])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, rationale, for, novel, combination, treatment, with, 'HSP90&alpha;/&beta;', inhibitor, and, 'RAS-RAF-MEK-ERK', signaling, pathway, inhibitors, to, improve, outcomes, in, patients, with, in, 'RAS-', or, 'BRAF-mutated', 'MM'])].
[sujeto(['Lung', adenocarcinoma, includes, recurrent]), verbo([activating]), complemento([oncogenic, mutations, '(', 'EGFR,', 'EML4-ALK,', 'ROS1)', that, have, been, associated, with, response, to, 'EGFR', and, 'ALK', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Many', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([evaluated, sorafenib, in, advanced, 'non-small-cell', lung, cancer, '(', 'NSCLC),', with, different, results])].
[sujeto(['We', present, a, case]), verbo([report]), complemento([of, a, patient, with, 'NSCLC', and, the, 'BRAF', 'G469R', mutation, who, showed, a, dramatic, response, to, sorafenib])].
[sujeto(['New', 2, -, amido, and, ureido, quinoline, derivatives, substituted, with, 2, -, 'N-methylamido-pyridin-4-yloxy', group, at, the, 5, -, position, of, quinoline, '(', 18, final, 'compounds)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, designed, and, synthesized, as, anticancer, sorafenib, congeners])].
[sujeto(['Among', the]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento(['derivatives,', fourteen, compounds, were, selected, for, evaluation, of, their, antiproliferative, activity, over, a, panel, of, 60, cancer, cell, lines, at, a, single, dose, concentration, of, 10, &, 'nbsp;&mu;M', at, 'National', 'Cancer', 'Institute', '(', 'NCI,', 'USA)'])].
[sujeto(['Compound', 9, b, and, 9, d, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, six, and, two, times, more, potent, than, sorafenib, against, 'A498', 'RCC', 'line,', with, 'IC50', values, of, 0.42, &, 'nbsp;&mu;M', and, 1.36, &, 'nbsp;&mu;M,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', molecular, 'docking,', cell, cycle, 'analysis,', compliance, to, 'Lipinski\'s', rule, of, 'five,', and, in, silico, toxicity, assessment]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported])].
[sujeto([',']), verbo([induces]), complemento([rapid, and, reversible, protein, hyperphosphorylation, and, premature, chromosome, condensation, '(', 'PCC)', at, nanomolar, concentrations, independent, of, 'cyclin-dependent', kinases])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, cellular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, 'LSA,', we, screened, 2951, shRNAs, targeting, a, pool, of, human, kinases, and, phosphatases, '(', 1140, 'RefSeqs)', to, identify, genes, that, modulate, 'PCC', in, response, to, 'LSA'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, 'RAF1', '(', 'C-RAF)', as, a, mediator, of, 'LSA-induced', 'PCC,', as, shRNAs, against, 'RAF1', conferred, resistance, to, 'LSA'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'LSA', induced, 'RAF1', phosphorylation, on, 'Serine', 338, within, minutes, in, human, colorectal, carcinoma, 'HCT-116,', ovarian, carcinoma, 'OVCAR-8,', and, 'Burkitt\'s', lymphoma, 'CA46', cell, lines])].
